tika-s0404t:389_4: vinicchayabhāvo veditabbo. Imasmiṃ pana sutte vitakkoyeva āgatoti yojanā. Imasmiṃ
tika-s0404t:389_5: pana sutteti sakkapañhasutte. Tattha hi “chando kho, devānaminda, vitakkanidāno”ti
tika-s0404t:389_6: āgataṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte. Vitakkeneva vinicchinantīti etena “vinicchinati etenāti
tika-s0404t:390_0: Chandanaṭṭhena chando, evaṃ rañjanaṭṭhena rāgoti chandarāgo. Svāyaṃ anāsevanatāya
tika-s0404t:390_1: mando hutvā pavatto idhādhippetoti āha “dubbalarāgassādhivacana”nti. Ajjhosānanti
tika-s0404t:390_2: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinivesanaṃ. “Mayhaṃ ida”nti hi taṇhāgāho yebhuyyena attaggāhasannissayova
tika-s0404t:390_3: hoti. Tenāha “ahaṃ mamantī”ti. Balavasanniṭṭhānanti ca tesaṃ gāhānaṃ thirabhāvappattimāha.
tika-s0404t:390_4: Taṇhādiṭṭhivasena pariggahakaraṇanti ahaṃ mamanti balavasanniṭṭhānavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa
tika-s0404t:390_5: attattaniyaggāhavatthuno aññāsādhāraṇaṃ viya katvā pariggahetvā ṭhānaṃ, tathāpavatto
tika-s0404t:390_6: lobhasahagatacittuppādo. Attanā pariggahitassa vatthuno yassa vasena parehi sādhāraṇabhāvassa
tika-s0404t:390_7: asahamāno hoti puggalo, so dhammo asahanatā. Evaṃ vacanatthaṃ vadanti niruttinayena.
tika-s0404t:390_8: Saddalakkhaṇena pana yassa dhammassa vasena macchariyayogato puggalo maccharo, tassa
tika-s0404t:390_9: bhāvo, kammaṃ vā macchariyaṃ, maccharo dhammo. Macchariyassa balavabhāvato ādarena
tika-s0404t:391_0: Attano phalaṃ karotīti karaṇaṃ, yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ. Adhikaṃ karaṇanti adhikaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:391_3: Ādiyanti etenāti ādānaṃ, daṇḍassa ādānaṃ daṇḍādānaṃ, daṇḍaṃ āharitvā paraviheṭhanacittuppādo.
tika-s0404t:391_4: Satthādānepi eseva nayo. Hatthaparāmāsādivasena kāyena kātabbo kalaho kāyakalaho.
tika-s0404t:391_5: Mammaghaṭṭanādivasena vācāya kātabbo kalaho vācākalaho. Virujjhanavasena virūpaṃ
tika-s0404t:391_6: gaṇhāti etenāti viggaho. Viruddhaṃ vadati etenāti vivādo. “Tuvaṃ tuva”nti agāravavacanasahacaraṇato
tika-s0404t:391_7: tuvaṃtuvaṃ. Sabbepi te tathāpavattadosasahagatā cittuppādā veditabbā. Tenāha bhagavā
tika-s0404t:394_0: 24-25. Catutthe sattā āvasanti etesūti sattāvāsā, nānattasaññiādibhedā sattanikāyā.
tika-s0404t:394_1: Yasmā te te sattanivāsā tappariyāpannānaṃ sattānaṃ tāya eva tappariyāpannatāya ādhāro
tika-s0404t:394_2: viya vattabbataṃ arahanti. Samudāyācāro hi avayavassa yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti, tasmā
tika-s0404t:394_3: “sattānaṃ āvāsā, vasanaṭṭhānānīti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Suddhāvāsāpi sattāvāsova “na so,
tika-s0404t:394_4: bhikkhave, sattāvāso sulabharūpo, yo mayā anāvutthapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā aññatra
tika-s0404t:394_5: suddhāvāsehi devehī”ti vacanato. Yadi evaṃ te kasmā idha na gahitāti tattha kāraṇamāha
tika-s0404t:394_6: “asabbakālikattā”tiādi. Vehapphalā pana catuttheyeva sattāvāse bhajantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:397_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa catuvīsataṅguliko hattho kukku, “kakkū”tipi
tika-s0404t:397_1: tasseva nāmaṃ. Aṭṭha kukkū upari nemassāti aṭṭha hatthā āvāṭassa upari uggantvā ṭhitā
tika-s0404t:400_0: 27. Sattame yatoti yasmiṃ kāle. Ayañhi to-saddo dā-saddo viya idha kālavisayo, yadāti
tika-s0404t:400_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Bhayāni verānīti bhīyate bhayaṃ, bhayena yogā, bhāyitabbena vā bhayaṃ
tika-s0404t:400_2: eva verappasavaṭṭhena veranti ca laddhanāmā cetanādayo. Pāṇātipātādayo hi yassa pavattanti,
tika-s0404t:400_3: yañca uddissa pavattīyanti, ubhayesañca verāvahā, tato eva cete bhāyitabbā verasañjanakā
tika-s0404t:400_4: nāmāti. Sotassa ariyamaggassa ādito pajjanaṃ paṭipatti adhigamo sotāpatti. Tadatthāya
tika-s0404t:400_5: tattha patiṭṭhitassa ca aṅgāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Duvidhañhi sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ sotāpattiatthāya
tika-s0404t:400_6: ca aṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ, yaṃ sotāpattimaggappaṭilābhato pubbabhāge sotāpattippaṭilābhāya
tika-s0404t:400_8: evaṃ āgataṃ. Paṭiladdhaguṇassa ca sotāpattiṃ patvā ṭhitassa aṅgaṃ, yaṃ “sotāpannassa
tika-s0404t:400_9: aṅga”ntipi vuccati “sotāpanno aṅgīyati ñāyati etenā”ti katvā, buddhe aveccappasādādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t:401_0: Khīṇanirayotiādīsu āyatiṃ tattha anuppajjanatāya khīṇo nirayo mayhati, so ahaṃ khīṇanirayo.
tika-s0404t:401_1: Esa nayo sabbattha. Sotāpannoti maggasotaṃ āpanno. Avinipātadhammoti na vinipātasabhāvo.
tika-s0404t:401_2: Niyatoti paṭhamamaggasaṅkhātena sammattaniyāmena niyato. Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhāto
tika-s0404t:401_3: sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ mayhanti sohaṃ sambodhiparāyaṇo, sambodhiṃ avassaṃ abhisambujjhanakoti attho.
tika-s0404t:402_0: Pāṇātipātapaccayāti pāṇātipātakammassa karaṇahetu. Bhayaṃ veranti atthato ekaṃ. Veraṃ
tika-s0404t:402_1: vuccati virodho, tadeva bhāyitabbato “bhaya”nti vuccati. Tañca panetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti
tika-s0404t:402_2: – bāhiraṃ, ajjhattikanti. Ekena hi ekassa pitā mārito hoti. So cinteti “etena kira
tika-s0404t:402_3: me pitā mārito, ahampi taṃyeva māressāmī”ti nisitaṃ satthaṃ ādāya carati. Yā tassa
tika-s0404t:402_4: abbhantare uppannā veracetanā, idaṃ bāhiraṃ veraṃ nāma tassa verassa mūlabhūtato
tika-s0404t:402_5: verakārakapuggalato bahibhāvattā. Yā pana itarassa “ayaṃ kira maṃ māressāmīti carati,
tika-s0404t:402_6: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ māressāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati, idaṃ ajjhattikaṃ veraṃ nāma.
tika-s0404t:402_7: Idaṃ tāva ubhayampi diṭṭhadhammikameva. Yā pana taṃ niraye uppannaṃ disvā “etaṃ paharissāmī”ti
tika-s0404t:402_8: jalitaṃ ayamuggaraṃ gaṇhantassa nirayapālassa cetanā uppajjati, idamassa samparāyikaṃ
tika-s0404t:402_9: bāhiraṃ veraṃ. Yā cassa “ayaṃ niddosaṃ maṃ paharissāmīti āgacchati, ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ
tika-s0404t:402_10: paharissāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati, idamassa samparāyikaṃ ajjhattaṃ veraṃ. Yaṃ panetaṃ
tika-s0404t:402_11: bāhiraṃ veraṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “puggalavera”nti vuccati. Dukkhaṃ domanassanti atthato
tika-s0404t:402_12: ekameva. Yathā cettha, evaṃ sesesupi “iminā mama bhaṇḍaṃ haṭaṃ, mayhaṃ dāresu cārittaṃ
tika-s0404t:402_13: āpannaṃ, musā vatvā attho bhaggo, surāmadamattena idaṃ nāma kata”ntiādinā nayena
tika-s0404t:403_0: Aveccappasādenāti adhigatena acalappasādena. Ariyakantehīti pañcahi sīlehi. Tāni
tika-s0404t:403_1: hi ariyānaṃ kantāni piyāni bhavanti, bhavantaragatāpi ariyā tāni na vijahanti, tasmā
tika-s0404t:403_2: “ariyakantānī”ti vuccanti. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge
tika-s0404t:406_0: 29. Navame vasati ettha phalaṃ tannimittatāya pavattatīti vatthu, kāraṇanti āha “āghātavatthūnī”ti.
tika-s0404t:406_1: Kopo nāmāyaṃ yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ uppajjati, na tattha ekavārameva uppajjati, atha kho
tika-s0404t:406_2: punapi uppajjatevāti vuttaṃ “bandhatī”ti. Atha vā yo paccayavisesena uppajjamāno
tika-s0404t:406_3: āghāto savisaye baddho viya na vigacchati, punapi uppajjateva. Taṃ sandhāyāha “āghātaṃ
tika-s0404t:406_4: bandhatī”ti. Taṃ panassa paccayavasena nibbattanaṃ uppādanamevāti vuttaṃ “uppādetī”ti.
tika-s0404t:409_0: 30. Dasame taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. Padajjhāhārena ca
tika-s0404t:409_1: attho veditabboti “taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosī”tiādimāha. Kena kāraṇena laddhabbaṃ
tika-s0404t:409_2: niratthakabhāvato. Kammassakā hi sattā. Te kassa ruciyā dukkhitā sukhitā vā bhavanti,
tika-s0404t:409_3: tasmā kevalaṃ tasmiṃ mayhaṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ, taṃ kutettha labbhāti adhippāyo. Atha
tika-s0404t:409_4: vā taṃ kopakāraṇaṃ ettha puggale kuto labbhā paramatthato kujjhitabbassa kujjhanakassa
tika-s0404t:409_5: ca abhāvato. Saṅkhāramattañhetaṃ, yadidaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ yaṃ “satto”ti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:409_6: te saṅkhārā ittarakhaṇikā, kassa ko kujjhatīti attho. Lābhā nāma ke siyuṃ aññatra anatthuppattito.
tika-s0404t:412: 31. Ekādasame anupubbanirodhāti anupubbena anukkamena pavattetabbanirodhā. Tenāha “anupaṭipāṭinirodhā”ti.
tika-s0404t:417: 32. Catutthassa paṭhame anupubbato viharitabbāti anupubbavihārā. Anupaṭipāṭiyāti anukkamena. Samāpajjitabbavihārāti samāpajjitvā samaṅgino hutvā viharitabbavihārā.
tika-s0404t:420_0: 33-34. Dutiye chātaṃ vuccati taṇhādiṭṭhiyo kāmānaṃ pātabbato tāsaṃ vasena vattanato,
tika-s0404t:420_1: tanninnattā natthi etesu chātanti nicchātā. Tenāha “taṇhādiṭṭhicchātāna”ntiādi. Tatiye natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:423_0: 35. Catutthe pabbatacārinīti pakatiyā pabbate bahulacārinī. Akhettaññūti agocaraññū.
tika-s0404t:423_2: abhāvena abyatto. Uparijhānassa padaṭṭhānabhāvānavabodhena akhettaññū. Sabbathāpi
tika-s0404t:423_3: samāpattikosallābhāvena akusalo. Samādhinimittassa vā anāsevanāya bālo. Abhāvanāya
tika-s0404t:423_4: abyatto. Abahulīkārena akhettaññū. Sammadeva anadhiṭṭhānato akusaloti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:423_5: Ubhato bhaṭṭhoti ubhayato jhānato bhaṭṭho. So hi appaguṇatāya na suppatiṭṭhitatāya
tika-s0404t:423_6: saussāhopi vināsato asāmatthiyato ca jhānadvayato parihīno.
tika-s0404t:426_0: 36. Pañcame aniccatoti iminā niccappaṭikkhepato tesaṃ aniccatamāha. Tato eva udayavayavantato
tika-s0404t:426_1: vipariṇāmato tāvakālikato ca te aniccāti jotitaṃ hoti. Yañhi niccaṃ na hoti, taṃ
tika-s0404t:426_2: udayavayaparicchinnajarāya maraṇena cāti dvedhā vipariṇataṃ ittarakkhaṇameva ca hoti.
tika-s0404t:426_3: Dukkhatoti na sukhato. Iminā sukhappaṭikkhepato tesaṃ dukkhatamāha. Tato eva ca abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato
tika-s0404t:426_4: dukkhavatthuto ca te dukkhāti jotitaṃ hoti. Udayavayavantatāya hi te abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato
tika-s0404t:426_5: nirantaradukkhatāya dukkhasseva ca adhiṭṭhānabhūto. Paccayayāpanīyatāya rogamūlatāya
tika-s0404t:426_6: ca rogato. Dukkhatāsūlayogato kilesāsucipaggharato uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātapakkabhijjanato
tika-s0404t:426_7: ca gaṇḍato. Pīḷājananato antotudanato dunnīharaṇato ca sallato. Avaḍḍhiāvahanato
tika-s0404t:426_8: aghavatthuto ca aghato. Aseribhāvajananato ābādhappatiṭṭhānatāya ca ābādhato. Avasavattanato
tika-s0404t:426_9: avidheyyatāya ca parato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi palujjanīyatāya palokato. Sāminivāsīkārakavedakaadhiṭṭhāyakavirahato
tika-s0404t:426_10: suññato. Attappaṭikkhepaṭṭhena anattato. Rūpādidhammāpi yathā na ettha attā atthīti
tika-s0404t:426_11: anattā, evaṃ sayampi attā na hontīti anattā. Tena abyāpārato nirīhato tucchato anattāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:427_0: Lakkhaṇattayameva sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ ekādasahi padehi vibhajitvā gahitanti dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t:427_1: “yasmā aniccato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Antosamāpattiyanti samāpattīnaṃ sahajātatāya samāpattīnaṃ
tika-s0404t:427_4: savanavasena. Thutivasenāti tatheva thomanāvasena guṇato saṃkittanavasena. Pariyattivasenāti
tika-s0404t:427_5: tassa dhammassa pariyāpuṇanavasena. Paññattivasenāti tadatthassa paññāpanavasena.
tika-s0404t:427_6: Ārammaṇakaraṇavaseneva upasaṃharati maggacittaṃ, “etaṃ santa”ntiādi pana avadhāraṇanivattitatthadassanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:427_7: Yathā vipassanā “etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇīta”ntiādinā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharati,
tika-s0404t:427_8: evaṃ maggo nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena abhisamento tattha labbhamāne sabbepi
tika-s0404t:427_9: visese asammohato paṭivijjhanto tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharati. Tenāha “iminā pana ākārenā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:428_0: So tattha ṭhitoti so adandhavipassako yogī tattha tāya aniccādilakkhaṇattayārammaṇāya
tika-s0404t:428_1: vipassanāya ṭhito. Sabbasoti sabbattha tassa tassa maggassa adhigamāya nibbattitasamathavipassanāsu.
tika-s0404t:428_2: Asakkonto anāgāmī hotīti heṭṭhimamaggāvahāsu eva samathavipassanāya chandarāgaṃ pahāya
tika-s0404t:428_3: aggamaggāvahāsu nikantiṃ pariyādātuṃ asakkonto anāgāmitāyameva saṇṭhāti.
tika-s0404t:429_0: Samatikkantattāti samathavasena vipassanāvasena cāti sabbathāpi rūpassa samatikkantattā.
tika-s0404t:429_1: Tenāha “ayaṃ hī”tiādi. Anenāti yoginā. Taṃ atikkammāti idaṃ yo paṭhamaṃ pañcavokāraekavokārapariyāpanne
tika-s0404t:429_2: dhamme sammadeva sammasitvā te vissajjetvā tato arūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā arūpadhamme
tika-s0404t:429_3: sammasati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha “idāni arūpaṃ sammasatī”ti.
tika-s0404t:432_0: 37. Chaṭṭhe okāsaṃ avasaraṃ adhigacchati etenāti okāsādhigamo, maggaphalasukhādhigamāya
tika-s0404t:432_1: okāsabhāvato vā okāso, tassa adhigamo okāsādhigamo. Ettha ca dīghanikāyeneva pana
tika-s0404t:432_2: suttantadesanāyaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ, catutthajjhānaṃ, arahattamaggoti tayo okāsādhigamā
tika-s0404t:432_3: āgatā. Tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pañca nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0404t:432_4: tiṭṭhatīti “paṭhamo okāsādhigamo”ti vuttaṃ. Catutthajjhānaṃ pana sukhadukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā
tika-s0404t:432_5: attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti dutiyo okāsādhigamo. Arahattamaggo sabbakilese vikkhambhetvā
tika-s0404t:432_6: attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti “tatiyo okāsādhigamo”ti vutto. Idha pana vakkhamānāni
tika-s0404t:432_7: tīṇi arūpajjhānāni sandhāya “okāsādhigamo”ti vuttaṃ. Tesaṃyeva ca gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati.
tika-s0404t:433_0: Sattānaṃ visuddhiṃ pāpanatthāyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi
tika-s0404t:433_1: kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhipāpanatthāya samatikkamanatthāya. Āyatiṃ anuppajjanañhi
tika-s0404t:433_2: idha “samatikkamo”ti vuttaṃ. Atthaṃ gamanatthāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa
tika-s0404t:433_3: cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya, nirodhāyāti attho. Ñāyati nicchayena kamati nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:433_4: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo, samucchedabhāvo ariyamaggoti āha “sahavipassanakassa
tika-s0404t:433_5: maggassā”ti. Paccakkhakaraṇatthāyāti attapaccakkhatāya. Parapaccayena vinā paccakkhakaraṇañhi
tika-s0404t:434_0: Rāgānugato samādhi abhinato nāma hoti ārammaṇe abhimukhābhāvena pavattiyā, dosānugato
tika-s0404t:434_1: pana apanato apagamanavasena pavattiyā, tadubhayappaṭikkhepena “na cābhinato na cāpanato”ti
tika-s0404t:434_3: viya na sasaṅkhārena sappayogena tadaṅgappahānavikkhambhanappahānavasena ca niggahetvā
tika-s0404t:434_4: vāretvā ṭhito. Kiñcarahi kilesānaṃ chinnante uppanno. Tathābhūtaṃ phalasamādhiṃ sandhāyetaṃ
tika-s0404t:437_0: 38. Sattame lokāyatavādakāti āyatiṃ hitaṃ loko na yatati na viruhati etenāti lokāyataṃ,
tika-s0404t:437_1: vitaṇḍasatthaṃ. Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti,
tika-s0404t:438_0: Daḷhaṃ thiraṃ dhanu etassāti daḷhadhanvā, so eva “daḷhadhammā”ti vutto. Paṭisattuvidhamanatthaṃ
tika-s0404t:438_1: dhanuṃ gaṇhātīti dhanuggaho. So eva usuṃ saraṃ asati khipatīti issāso. Dvisahassathāmanti
tika-s0404t:438_2: lohādibhāraṃ vahituṃ samatthaṃ dvisahassathāmaṃ. Tenāha “dvisahassathāmaṃ nāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:438_3: Daṇḍeti dhanudaṇḍe. Yāva kaṇḍappamāṇāti dīghato yattakaṃ kaṇḍassa pamāṇaṃ, tattake
tika-s0404t:438_4: dhanudaṇḍe ukkhittamatte āropitesuyeva jiyādaṇḍesu so ce bhāro pathavito muccati,
tika-s0404t:438_5: evaṃ idaṃ dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma dhanūti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uggahitasippoti uggahitadhanusippo.
tika-s0404t:438_6: Katahatthoti thirataraṃ lakkhesu avirajjhanasarakkhepo. Īdiso pana tattha vasibhūto
tika-s0404t:438_7: katahattho nāma hotīti āha “ciṇṇavasibhāvo”ti. Kataṃ rājakulādīsu upecca asanaṃ etena
tika-s0404t:438_8: so katūpāsanoti āha “rājakulādīsu dassitasippo”ti. Evaṃ katanti evaṃ antosusirakaraṇādinā sallahukaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0404t:441_0: 39-40. Aṭṭhame abhiyiṃsūti kadā abhiyiṃsu? Yadā balavanto ahesuṃ, tadā. Tatrāyamanupubbikathā
tika-s0404t:441_1: – sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake magho nāma māṇavo hutvā tettiṃsa purise gahetvā
tika-s0404t:441_2: kalyāṇakammaṃ karonto satta vatapadāni pūretvā tattha kālaṅkato devaloke nibbatti.
tika-s0404t:441_3: Taṃ balavakammānubhāvena saparisaṃ sesadevatā dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhantaṃ disvā
tika-s0404t:441_4: “āgantukadevaputtā āgatā”ti nevāsikā gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Sakko sakaparisāya saññaṃ
tika-s0404t:441_5: adāsi “mārisā mā gandhapānaṃ pivittha, pivanākāramattameva dassethā”ti. Te tathā
tika-s0404t:441_6: akaṃsu. Nevāsikadevatā suvaṇṇasarakehi upanītaṃ gandhapānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ pivitvā mattā
tika-s0404t:441_7: tattha tattha suvaṇṇapathaviyaṃ patitvā sayiṃsu. Sakko “gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti
tika-s0404t:441_8: te pādesu gahetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi. Sakkassa puññatejena tadanuvattakāpi sabbe
tika-s0404t:441_9: tattheva patiṃsu. Te sineruvemajjhakāle saññaṃ labhitvā, “tātā, suraṃ na pivimha,
tika-s0404t:441_10: suraṃ na pivimhā”ti āhaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya asurā nāma jātā. Atha nesaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0404t:441_11: sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ asurabhavanaṃ nibbatti. Sakko tesaṃ nivattitvā
tika-s0404t:441_12: anāgamanatthāya ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-s0404t:446_0: Dve nagarāni hi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca
tika-s0404t:446_1: asuranagarañca. Yadā hi asurā balavanto honti, atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ
tika-s0404t:446_2: pavisitvā dvāre pidahite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti. Yadā devā
tika-s0404t:446_3: balavanto honti, athāsurehi palāyitvā asuranagarassa dvāre pidahite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi
tika-s0404t:446_4: kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti. Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma. Tesaṃ antarā etesu
tika-s0404t:446_5: uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā. Tattha uragasaddena nāgā gahitā.
tika-s0404t:446_6: Te hi udake balavanto honti, tasmā sinerussa paṭhamālinde etesaṃ ārakkhā. Karoṭisaddena
tika-s0404t:446_7: supaṇṇā gahitā. Tesaṃ kira karoṭi nāma pānabhojanaṃ, tena taṃ nāmaṃ labhiṃsu, dutiyālinde
tika-s0404t:446_8: tesaṃ ārakkhā. Payassahārisaddena kumbhaṇḍā gahitā, dānavarakkhasā kira te, tatiyālinde
tika-s0404t:446_9: tesaṃ ārakkhā. Madanayutasaddena yakkhā gahitā. Visamacārino kira te yujjhasoṇḍā,
tika-s0404t:446_10: catutthālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Caturo ca mahattāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā, pañcamālinde
tika-s0404t:446_11: tesaṃ ārakkhā, tasmā yadi asurā kupitāvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti yujjhituṃ. Yaṃ
tika-s0404t:446_12: girino paṭhamaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ, taṃ uragā paṭibāhayanti. Evaṃ sesesu sesā.
tika-s0404t:447_0: Te pana asurā āyuvaṇṇayasaissariyasampattīhi tāvatiṃsasadisāva, tasmā antarā attānaṃ
tika-s0404t:447_1: ajānitvā pāṭaliyā pupphitāya “na idaṃ devanagaraṃ, tattha pāricchattako pupphati,
tika-s0404t:447_2: idha pana cittapāṭalī, jarasakkenāmhākaṃ suraṃ pāyetvā vañcitā, devanagarañca no
tika-s0404t:447_3: gahitaṃ, gacchāma, tena saddhiṃ yujjhissāmā”ti hatthiassarathe āruyha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇiphalakāni
tika-s0404t:447_4: gahetvā yuddhasajjā hutvā asurabheriyo vādentā mahāsamudde udakaṃ dvidhā bhetvā uṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0404t:447_5: Te deve vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā vammikaṃ viya sineruṃ āruhituṃ ārabhanti. Atha nesaṃ
tika-s0404t:447_6: paṭhamaṃ nāgehi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ kho pana yuddhe na kassaci chavi vā
tika-s0404t:447_7: cammaṃ vā chijjati, na lohitaṃ uppajjati, kevalaṃ kumārakānaṃ dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ
tika-s0404t:447_8: viya aññamaññasantāsanamattameva hoti. Koṭisatāpi koṭisahassāpi nāgā tehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0404t:447_9: yujjhitvā te asurapuraṃyeva pavesetvā nivattanti. Yadā pana asurā balavanto honti,
tika-s0404t:447_10: atha nāgā osakkitvā dutiye ālinde supaṇṇehi saddhiṃ ekatova hutvā yujjhanti. Esa
tika-s0404t:447_11: nayo supaṇṇādīsupi. Yadā pana tāni pañcapi ṭhānāni asurā maddanti, tadā ekato sampiṇḍitānipi
tika-s0404t:447_12: tāni pañca balāni osakkanti. Atha cattāro mahārājāno gantvā sakkassa taṃ pavattiṃ
tika-s0404t:447_13: ārocenti. Sakko tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ vejayantarathaṃ āruyha
tika-s0404t:447_14: sayaṃ vā nikkhamati, ekaṃ puttaṃ vā peseti. Yadā devā puna apaccāgamanāya asure jiniṃsu,
tika-s0404t:447_15: tadā sakko asure palāpetvā pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ datvā vediyapāde vajirahatthā
tika-s0404t:447_16: indapaṭimāyo ṭhapesi. Asurā kālena kālaṃ uṭṭhahitvā paṭimāyo disvā “sakko appamatto
tika-s0404t:447_17: tiṭṭhatī”ti tatova nivattanti. Idha pana yadā asurānaṃ jayo ahosi, devānaṃ parājayo,
tika-s0404t:447_18: taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ – “parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā apayiṃsuyeva uttarenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu asurā”ti.
tika-s0404t:448_0: Dakkhiṇābhimukhā hutvāti cakkavāḷapabbatābhimukhā hutvā. Asurā kira devehi parājitā
tika-s0404t:448_2: vālikāpuline yattha paṇṇakuṭiyo māpetvā isayo vasanti, tattha gantvā isīnaṃ assamapadena
tika-s0404t:448_3: gacchantā “sakko imehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhe nāseti, gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti
tika-s0404t:448_4: kupitā assamapade pānīyaghaṭacaṅkamanapaṇṇasālādīni viddhaṃsenti. Isayo araññato
tika-s0404t:448_5: phalāphalaṃ ādāya āgatā disvā puna dukkhena paṭipākatikaṃ karonti, tepi punappunaṃ
tika-s0404t:448_6: tatheva parājitā gantvā vināsenti. Tena vuttaṃ – “parājitā ca kho, bhikkhave, asurā
tika-s0404t:451: 41. Dasame pakkhandatīti pavisati. Pasīdatīti pasādaṃ abhiruciṃ āpajjati, patiṭṭhāti vimuccatīti attho. Kathāpābhatanti kathāya mūlaṃ. Mūlañhi “pābhata”nti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-s0404t:454: Tenevāha “kathāpābhatanti kathāmūla”nti. Vitakkaggahaṇeneva taṃsahacarito vicāropi gahito. Tenevettha bahuvacananiddeso katoti āha “vitakkesūti vitakkavicāresū”ti.
tika-s0404t:459_0: 42-51. Pañcamassa paṭhame udāyīti tayo therā udāyī nāma kāḷudāyī, lāḷudāyī, mahāudāyīti,
tika-s0404t:459_1: idha kāḷudāyī adhippetoti āha “udāyīti kāḷudāyitthero”ti. Sambādheti sampīḷitataṇhāsaṃkilesādinā
tika-s0404t:459_2: sauppīḷanatāya paramasambādhe. Ativiya saṅkaraṭṭhānabhūto hi nīvaraṇasambādho adhippeto.
tika-s0404t:459_3: Okāsoti jhānassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Nīvaraṇasambādhābhāvena hi jhānaṃ idha “okāso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:459_4: Paṭilīnanisabhoti vā paṭilīno hutvā seṭṭho, paṭilīnānaṃ vā seṭṭhoti paṭilīnanisabho.
tika-s0404t:459_5: Paṭilīnā nāma pahīnamānā vuccanti mānussayavasena uṇṇatābhāvato. Yathāha “kathañca,
tika-s0404t:459_6: bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭilīno hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimāno pahīno hoti
tika-s0404t:459_7: ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃgato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo”ti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
tika-s0404t:469_1: avippaṭisārudayāni. Etena avippaṭisāro nāma sīlassa udayamattaṃ, saṃvaddhitassa rukkhassa
tika-s0404t:469_2: chāyāpupphasadisaṃ, añño eva panānena nipphādetabbo samādhiādiguṇoti dasseti. “Yāva
tika-s0404t:469_3: maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi, tāva taruṇavipassanā”ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato
tika-s0404t:469_4: paraṃ ayañca vipassanā virajjati yogāvacaro viratto puriso viya bhariyāya saṅkhārato etenāti virāgo.
tika-s0404t:472_0: 2-5. Dutiye saṃsāramahoghassa paratīrabhāvato yo naṃ adhigacchati, taṃ pāreti gametīti
tika-s0404t:472_1: pāraṃ, nibbānaṃ. Tabbidūratāya natthi ettha pāranti apāraṃ, saṃsāro. Tenāha “orimatīrabhūtā
tika-s0404t:475_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe santaṃ santanti appetvā nisinnassātiādīsu santaṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ paṇītantiādīni
tika-s0404t:475_1: vadati. Iminā pana ākārena taṃ paṭivijjhitvā tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharato phalasamāpattisaṅkhāto
tika-s0404t:475_2: cittuppādo tathā pavattatīti veditabbo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
tika-s0404t:480_0: 11-14. Dutiyassa paṭhame nātidūranti gocaraṭṭhānato aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya nātidūraṃ.
tika-s0404t:480_1: Nāccāsannanti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaraṭṭhānato pañcadhanusatikatāya na atiāsannaṃ.
tika-s0404t:480_3: gamanassa ca āgamanassa ca yuttarūpattā gamanāgamanasampannaṃ. Divasabhāge mahājanasaṃkiṇṇatābhāvena
tika-s0404t:480_4: divā appākiṇṇaṃ. Abhāvattho hi ayaṃ appa-saddo “appiccho”tiādīsu viya. Rattiyaṃ manussasaddābhāvena
tika-s0404t:481_0: Appakasirenāti akasirena sukheneva. Sīlādiguṇānaṃ thirabhāvappattiyā therā. Suttageyyādi
tika-s0404t:481_1: bahu sutaṃ etesanti bahussutā. Tamuggahadhāraṇena sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena
tika-s0404t:481_2: ca āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti āgatāgamā. Suttābhidhammasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0404t:481_3: dhammassa dhāraṇena dhammadharā. Vinayassa dhāraṇena vinayadharā. Tesaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ
tika-s0404t:481_4: mātikāya dhāraṇena mātikādharā. Tattha tattha dhammaparipucchāya paripucchati. Atthaparipucchāya
tika-s0404t:481_5: paripañhati vīmaṃsati vicāreti. Idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ, imassa ko atthoti paripucchāparipañhākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:481_6: Avivaṭañceva pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato vivaranti. Anuttānīkatañca
tika-s0404t:481_7: yuttivibhāvanena uttāniṃ karonti. Kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu saṃsayuppattiyā hetutāya
tika-s0404t:481_8: gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu pāḷippadesesu yāthāvato vinicchayappadānena kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
tika-s0404t:482_0: Ettha ca nātidūraṃ nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannanti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, divā appākiṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:482_2: ekaṃ, tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa…pe… parikkhārāti ekaṃ, tasmiṃ kho pana
tika-s0404t:482_3: senāsane therā…pe… kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodentīti ekaṃ. Evaṃ pañca aṅgāni veditabbāni. Dutiyādīni uttānatthāni.
tika-s0404t:485_0: 15-16. Pañcame kārāpakaappamādo nāma “ime akusalā dhammā pahātabbā, ime kusalā dhammā
tika-s0404t:485_2: appamādo. Esāti appamādo. Lokiyova na lokuttaro. Ayañcāti ca esāti ca appamādameva
tika-s0404t:486_0: Jaṅgalānanti jaṅgalacārīnaṃ. Jaṅgala-saddo cettha kharabhāvasāmaññena pathavīpariyāyo,
tika-s0404t:486_3: pakkhepa”nti. “Upakkhepa”ntipi paṭhanti, upanetvā pakkhipitabbanti attho. Vassikāya
tika-s0404t:486_4: pupphaṃ vassikaṃ yathā “āmalakiyā phalaṃ āmalaka”nti. Mahātalasminti uparipāsāde.
tika-s0404t:489_0: 17-18. Sattame yehi sīlādīhi samannāgato bhikkhu dhammasaraṇatāya dhammeneva nāthati
tika-s0404t:489_1: āsīsati abhibhavatīti nātho vuccati, te tassa nāthabhāvakarā dhammā nāthakaraṇāti
tika-s0404t:489_2: vuttāti āha “attano sanāthabhāvakarā patiṭṭhakarāti attho”ti. Tattha attano patiṭṭhakarāti
tika-s0404t:489_3: yassa nāthabhāvakarā, tassa attano patiṭṭhāvidhāyino. Appatiṭṭho anātho, sappatiṭṭho
tika-s0404t:489_4: sanāthoti patiṭṭhattho nātha-saddo. Kalyāṇaguṇayogato kalyāṇāti dassento “sīlādiguṇasampannā”ti
tika-s0404t:489_5: āha. Mijjanalakkhaṇā mettā etassa atthīti mitto. So vuttanayena kalyāṇo assa atthīti
tika-s0404t:489_6: tassa atthitāmattaṃ kalyāṇamittapadena vuttaṃ. Assa tena sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsoti
tika-s0404t:489_7: taṃ dassetuṃ “kalyāṇasahāyo”ti vuttanti āha “tevassā”ti. Te eva kalyāṇamittā assa
tika-s0404t:489_8: bhikkhuno. Saha ayanatoti saha pavattanato. Asamodhāne cittena, samodhāne pana cittena
tika-s0404t:489_9: ceva kāyena ca sampavaṅko. Sukhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ anukūlagāhimhi ādaragāravavati puggaleti
tika-s0404t:489_10: suvaco. Tenāha “sukhena vattabbo”tiādi. Khamoti khanto. Tamevassa khamabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t:489_11: “gāḷhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vāmatoti micchā, ayoniso vā gaṇhāti. Paṭippharatīti paṭāṇikabhāvena
tika-s0404t:489_12: tiṭṭhati. Padakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhātīti sammā, yoniso vā gaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t:490_0: Uccāvacānīti vipulakhuddakāni. Tatrupagamaniyāyāti tatra tatra mahante khuddake ca
tika-s0404t:490_1: kamme sādhanavasena upāyena upagacchantiyā, tassa tassa kammassa nipphādane samatthāyāti
tika-s0404t:490_2: attho. Tatrupāyāyāti vā tatra tatra kamme sādhetabbe upāyabhūtāya.
tika-s0404t:491_0: Dhamme assa kāmoti dhammakāmoti byadhikaraṇānampi bāhirattho samāso hotīti katvā
tika-s0404t:491_1: vuttaṃ. Kāmetabbato vā piyāyitabbato kāmo, dhammo. Dhammo kāmo assāti dhammakāmo.
tika-s0404t:491_2: Dhammoti pariyattidhammo adhippetoti āha “tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ piyāyatīti attho”ti.
tika-s0404t:491_3: Samudāharaṇaṃ kathanaṃ samudāhāro, piyo samudāhāro etassāti piyasamudāhāro. Sayañcāti
tika-s0404t:491_4: ettha ca-saddena “sakkacca”nti padaṃ anukaḍḍhati. Tena sayañca sakkaccaṃ desetukāmo
tika-s0404t:491_5: hotīti yojanā. Abhidhammo satta pakaraṇāni “adhiko abhivisiṭṭho ca pariyattidhammo”ti
tika-s0404t:491_6: katvā. Vinayo ubhatovibhaṅgā vinayanato kāyavācānaṃ. Abhivinayo khandhakaparivārā
tika-s0404t:491_8: Dhammo eva piṭakadvayassapi pariyattidhammabhāvato. Maggaphalāni abhidhammo “nibbānadhammassa
tika-s0404t:491_9: abhimukho”ti katvā. Kilesavūpasamakaraṇaṃ pubbabhāgiyā tisso sikkhā saṅkhepato vivaṭṭanissito
tika-s0404t:491_10: samatho vipassanā ca. Uḷārapāmojjoti balavapāmojjo. Kāraṇattheti nimittatthe. Kusaladhammanimittaṃ
tika-s0404t:491_11: hissa vīriyārambho. Tenāha “tesaṃ adhigamatthāyā”ti. Kusalesu dhammesūti vā nipphādetabbe
tika-s0404t:491_12: bhummaṃ yathā “cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti. Aṭṭhame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:494_0: 19. Navame ariyānaṃ eva āvāsāti ariyāvāsā anariyānaṃ tādisānaṃ asambhavato. Ariyāti
tika-s0404t:494_1: cettha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena khīṇāsavā gahitā. Te ca yasmā tehi sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsā
tika-s0404t:494_2: eva, tasmā vuttaṃ “te āvasiṃsu āvasanti āvasissantī”ti. Tattha āvasiṃsūti nissāya
tika-s0404t:494_3: āvasiṃsu. Pañcaṅgavippahīnatādayo hi ariyānaṃ apassayā. Tesu pañcaṅgavippahānapaccekasaccapanodanaesanāosaṭṭhāni,
tika-s0404t:494_4: “saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, adhivāseti parivajjeti vinodetī”ti vuttesu apassenesu vinodanañca
tika-s0404t:497_0: 20. Dasame kasmā pana bhagavā kurusu viharanto imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsīti āha “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:497_1: Kururaṭṭhaṃ kira tadā tannivāsisattānaṃ yonisomanasikāravantatādinā yebhuyyena suppaṭipannatāya
tika-s0404t:497_2: pubbe ca katapuññatābalena vā tadā utuādisampattiyuttameva ahosi. Keci pana “pubbe
tika-s0404t:497_4: hoti. Bhagavato kāle sātisayaṃ utusappāyādiyuttaṃ raṭṭhaṃ ahosī”ti vadanti. Tattha
tika-s0404t:497_5: bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena
tika-s0404t:497_6: niccaṃ kallasarīrā kallacittā ca honti. Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā
tika-s0404t:498_0: Yuttappayuttāti satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya yuttā ceva payuttā ca. Tasmiñhi janapade catasso
tika-s0404t:498_1: parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti, antamaso dāsakammakaraparijanāpi
tika-s0404t:498_3: niratthakakathā nāma nappavattati. Sace kāci itthī, “amma, tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ
tika-s0404t:498_4: manasi karosī”ti pucchitā “na kiñcī”ti vadati, taṃ garahanti “dhīratthu tava jīvitaṃ,
tika-s0404t:498_5: jīvamānāpi tvaṃ matasadisā”ti. Atha naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ
tika-s0404t:498_6: satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti. Yā pana “ahaṃ asukaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ nāma manasi karomī”ti
tika-s0404t:498_7: vadati, tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ, tvaṃ nāma
tika-s0404t:498_8: manussattaṃ pattā, tavatthāya sammāsambuddho uppanno”tiādīhi pasaṃsanti. Na kevalañcettha
tika-s0404t:498_9: manussajātikāyeva satipaṭṭhānamanasikārayuttā, te nissāya viharantā tiracchānagatāpi.
tika-s0404t:499_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati. So bhikkhuniupassayaṃ
tika-s0404t:499_1: upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato. Taṃ sāmaṇeriyo gahetvā
tika-s0404t:499_2: paṭijaggiṃsu, “buddharakkhito”ti cassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ
tika-s0404t:499_3: disvā mahātherī āha “buddharakkhitā”ti. Kiṃ, ayyoti. Atthi te koci bhāvanāmanasikāroti?
tika-s0404t:499_4: Natthayyeti. Āvuso, pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ
tika-s0404t:499_5: na vaṭṭati, kocideva manasikāro icchitabbo, tvaṃ pana aññaṃ na sakkhissasi, “aṭṭhi
tika-s0404t:499_6: aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyaṃ karohīti. So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
tika-s0404t:500_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena
tika-s0404t:500_1: aggahesi. So “kiri kirī”ti saddamakāsi. Sāmaṇeriyo sutvā, “ayye, buddharakkhito sakuṇena
tika-s0404t:500_2: gahito, mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ. Taṃ ānetvā purato
tika-s0404t:500_3: ṭhapitaṃ therī āha, “buddharakkhita, sakuṇena gahitakāle kiṃ cintesī”ti. Ayye, na
tika-s0404t:500_4: aññaṃ cintesiṃ, “aṭṭhipuñjova aṭṭhipuñjaṃ gahetvā gacchati, katarasmiṃ ṭhāne vippakirissatī”ti
tika-s0404t:500_5: evaṃ, ayye, aṭṭhipuñjameva cintesinti. Sādhu sādhu, buddharakkhita, anāgate bhavakkhayassa
tika-s0404t:500_6: te paccayo bhavissatīti. Evaṃ tattha tiracchānagatāpi satipaṭṭhānamanasikārayuttā.
tika-s0404t:501: Dīghanikāyādīsu mahānidānādīnīti dīghanikāye mahānidānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānaṃ sāropamaṃ rukkhopamaṃ raṭṭhapālaṃ māgaṇḍiyaṃ āneñjasappāyanti evamādīni.
tika-s0404t:502_0: Ñāṇādayoti ñāṇañceva taṃsampayuttadhammā ca. Tenāha “ñāṇanti vutte”tiādi. Ñāṇasampayuttacittāni
tika-s0404t:502_1: labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato. Mahācittānīti aṭṭhapi mahākiriyacittāni
tika-s0404t:502_3: Dasa cittānīti aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanacittehi saddhiṃ dasa
tika-s0404t:502_4: cittāni labbhanti. Arajjanādussanavasena pavatti tesampi sādhāraṇāti. “Upekkhako
tika-s0404t:502_5: viharatī”ti vacanato chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena āgatānaṃ imesaṃ satatavihārānaṃ somanassaṃ
tika-s0404t:502_6: kathaṃ labbhatīti āha “āsevanavasena labbhatī”ti. Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi
tika-s0404t:502_7: ārammaṇe majjhatto viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanato.
tika-s0404t:502_8: Kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārābhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tattha
tika-s0404t:502_9: yāthāvasabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ hutvā pavattateva,
tika-s0404t:502_10: tañca kho pubbāsevanavasena. Tena vuttaṃ “āsevanavasena labbhatī”ti. Ārakkhakiccaṃ
tika-s0404t:502_11: sādheti sativepullappattattā. Caratotiādinā niccasamādānaṃ dasseti, taṃ vikkhepābhāvena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:503_0: Pabbajjūpagatāti yaṃ kiñci pabbajjaṃ upagatā, na samitapāpā. Bhovādinoti jātimattabrāhmaṇe
tika-s0404t:503_1: vadati. Pāṭekkasaccānīti tehi tehi diṭṭhigatikehi pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni “idameva sacca”nti
tika-s0404t:503_2: abhiniviṭṭhāni diṭṭhisaccādīni. Tānipi hi “idameva sacca”nti gahaṇaṃ upādāya “saccānī”ti
tika-s0404t:503_3: voharīyanti. Tenāha “idamevā”tiādi. Nīhaṭānīti attano santānato nīharitāni apanītāni.
tika-s0404t:503_4: Gahitaggahaṇassāti ariyamaggādhigamato pubbe gahitassa diṭṭhiggāhassa. Vissaṭṭhabhāvavevacanānīti
tika-s0404t:504_0: Natthi etāsaṃ vayo vekallanti avayāti āha “anūnā”ti, anavasesoti attho. Esanāti kāmesanādayo.
tika-s0404t:504_1: Maggassa kiccanipphatti kathitā rāgādīnaṃ pahīnabhāvadīpanato. Paccavekkhaṇaphalaṃ
tika-s0404t:504_2: kathitanti paccavekkhaṇamukhena ariyaphalaṃ kathitaṃ. Adhigate hi aggaphale sabbaso
tika-s0404t:504_3: rāgādīnaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ pajānāti, tañca pajānanaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti.
tika-s0404t:509_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame visamaṭṭhānesūti papātādīsu visamaṭṭhānesu. “Aññehi asādhāraṇānī”ti
tika-s0404t:509_1: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu cetāni sāvakānampi ekaccānaṃ uppajjantīti? Kāmaṃ uppajjanti, yādisāni
tika-s0404t:509_2: pana buddhānaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇādīni, na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ kadācipi uppajjantīti
tika-s0404t:509_3: aññehi asādhāraṇānīti. Tenāha “tathāgatasseva balānī”ti. Imameva hi yathāvuttalesaṃ
tika-s0404t:509_4: apekkhitvā tadabhāvato āsayānusayañāṇādīsu eva asādhāraṇasamaññā niruḷhā. Kāmaṃ ñāṇabalānaṃ
tika-s0404t:509_5: ñāṇasambhāro visesapaccayo, puññasambhāropi pana nesaṃ paccayo eva. Ñāṇasambhārassapi
tika-s0404t:510_1: balena pākatikā hatthijāti. Dasannaṃ purisānanti thāmamajjhimānaṃ dasannaṃ purisānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:510_2: Ekassa tathāgatassa kāyabalanti ānetvā sambandho. Ekassāti ca tathā heṭṭhā kathāyaṃ
tika-s0404t:510_3: āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ. Nārāyanasaṅghātabalanti ettha nārā vuccanti rasmiyo.
tika-s0404t:510_4: Tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ, tasmā nārāyanasaṅghātabalanti
tika-s0404t:510_5: vajirasaṅghātabalanti attho. Ñāṇabalaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva, na kāyabalaṃ viya
tika-s0404t:511_0: Saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni, sattasattati ñāṇānīti vuttaṃ, tattha pana nidānavagge
tika-s0404t:511_1: sattasattati āgatāni catucattārīsañca. Tesattati pana paṭisambhidāmagge sutamayādīni
tika-s0404t:511_2: āgatāni dissanti, na saṃyuttake. Aññānipīti etena ñāṇavatthuvibhaṅge ekakādivasena
tika-s0404t:511_3: vuttāni, aññattha ca “pubbante ñāṇa”ntiādinā brahmajālādīsu ca “tayidaṃ tathāgato
tika-s0404t:511_4: pajānāti ‘imāni diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni evaṃ gahitānī’ti”ādinā vuttāni anekāni ñāṇappabhedāni
tika-s0404t:511_5: saṅgaṇhāti. Yāthāvappaṭivedhato sayañca akampiyaṃ puggalañca taṃsamaṅginaṃ neyyesu
tika-s0404t:512_0: Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbaññutāpaṭijānanavasena abhimukhaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0404t:512_1: aṭṭha vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti āsabhā, pubbabuddhā. Idaṃ panāti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0404t:512_2: sabbaññutameva vadati. Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0404t:513_0: Aṭṭhasu parisāsūti “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, anekasataṃ khattiyaparisaṃ…pe…
tika-s0404t:513_1: tatra vata maṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatīti nimittametaṃ, sāriputta, na samanupassāmī”ti
tika-s0404t:513_2: vuttāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu. Abhītanādaṃ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena dasabalohanti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0404t:514_0: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:514_1: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa avabujjhanamattena hotīti
tika-s0404t:514_2: “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana
tika-s0404t:514_3: yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇapavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ
tika-s0404t:515_0: Tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ, kiṃ bhūmiyaṃ puriso viya, noti āha “tadāyattavuttitāyā”ti. Ṭhānanti
tika-s0404t:515_1: cettha attalābho dharamānatā ca, na gatinivattīti āha “uppajjati ceva pavattati cā”ti.
tika-s0404t:515_2: Yattha panetaṃ dasabalañāṇaṃ vitthāritaṃ, taṃ dassento “abhidhamme panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:516_0: Samādiyantīti samādānāni, tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-s0404t:516_1: Kammameva vā kammasamādānanti etena samādānasaddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagatasadde
tika-s0404t:516_2: gatasaddassa viya. Gatīti nirayādigatiyo. Upadhīti attabhāvo. Kāloti kammassa vipaccanārahakālo.
tika-s0404t:517_0: Agatigāmininti nibbānagāminiṃ. Vuttañhi “nibbānañcāhaṃ, sāriputta, pajānāmi nibbānagāminiñca
tika-s0404t:517_1: paṭipada”nti. Bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā
tika-s0404t:517_2: tassevekassa jīvitindriyārammaṇā, taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ nānākāraṃ. Tesu hi eko ādarena
tika-s0404t:517_3: chandajāto karoti, eko “ehi tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito karoti, eko samānacchando
tika-s0404t:517_4: viya hutvā appaṭibāhamāno vicarati. Tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati, eko
tika-s0404t:517_5: tiracchānayoniyaṃ, eko pettivisaye. Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva “iminā nīhārena
tika-s0404t:517_6: āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati, esa tiracchānayoniyaṃ, esa pettivisaye”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t:517_7: Niraye nibbattamānampi “esa mahāniraye nibbattissati, esa ussadaniraye”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t:517_8: Tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattamānampi “esa apādako bhavissati, esa dvipādako, esa catuppado,
tika-s0404t:517_9: esa bahuppado”ti jānāti. Pettivisaye nibbattamānampi “esa nijjhāmataṇhiko bhavissati,
tika-s0404t:517_10: esa khuppipāsiko, esa paradattūpajīvī”ti jānāti. Tesu ca kammesu “idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
tika-s0404t:517_11: ākaḍḍhissati, idaṃ aññena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t:518_0: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva,
tika-s0404t:518_1: taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ nānākāraṃ. Tesu hi eko ādarena karotīti sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ,
tika-s0404t:518_2: tasmā tesu keci devaloke nibbattanti, keci manussaloke. Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva
tika-s0404t:518_3: jānāti. “Iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa manussaloke nibbattissati, esa devaloke. Tatthāpi
tika-s0404t:518_4: esa khattiyakule, esa brāhmaṇakule, esa vessakule, esa suddakule, esa paranimmitavasavattīsu,
tika-s0404t:518_5: esa nimmānaratīsu, esa tusitesu, esa yāmesu, esa tāvatiṃsesu, esa cātumahārājikesu,
tika-s0404t:519_0: Tathā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentesuyeva “iminā nīhārena esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-s0404t:519_1: esa mahābhūtamattameva vavatthapessati, esa rūpapariggaheyeva ṭhassati, esa arūpapariggaheyeva,
tika-s0404t:519_2: esa nāmarūpapariggaheyeva, esa paccayapariggaheyeva, esa lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāyameva,
tika-s0404t:519_3: esa paṭhamaphaleyeva, esa dutiyaphaleyeva, esa tatiyaphaleyeva, esa arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti
tika-s0404t:519_4: jānāti. Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontesupi “imassa parikammamattameva bhavissati, esa nimittaṃ
tika-s0404t:519_5: uppādessati, esa appanaṃ eva pāpuṇissati, esa jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
tika-s0404t:520_0: Kāmanato kāmetabbato kāmappaṭisaṃyuttato ca dhātu kāmadhātu. Ādi-saddena byāpādadhāturūpadhātuādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t:520_2: nānādhātuṃ khandhalokaṃ āyatanalokaṃ dhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti yojanā. “Ayaṃ
tika-s0404t:520_3: rūpakkhandho nāma…pe… ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāma. Tesupi ekavidhena rūpakkhandho,
tika-s0404t:520_4: ekādasavidhena rūpakkhandho. Ekavidhena vedanākkhandho, bahuvidhena vedanākkhandho.
tika-s0404t:520_5: Ekavidhena saññākkhandho…pe… saṅkhārakkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho, bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandho”ti
tika-s0404t:520_6: evaṃ tāva khandhalokassa, “idaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nāma…pe… idaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma. Tattha
tika-s0404t:520_7: dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā, dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā āyatanalokassa, “ayaṃ cakkhudhātu
tika-s0404t:520_8: nāma…pe… ayaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu nāma. Tattha soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā
tika-s0404t:520_9: dhātulokassa anekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca pajānāti. Na kevalaṃ upādinnasaṅkhāralokasseva,
tika-s0404t:520_10: atha kho anupādinnakasaṅkhāralokassapi “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa
tika-s0404t:520_11: khandho seto, imassa kāḷo, imassa maṭṭho, imassa sakaṇṭako, imassa bahalattaco, imassa
tika-s0404t:520_12: tanuttaco, imassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena evarūpaṃ, imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ
tika-s0404t:520_13: lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ, imassa phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0404t:520_14: susaṇṭhānaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ
tika-s0404t:520_15: kaṭukaṃ ambilaṃ kasāvaṃ, imassa kaṇṭako tikhiṇo kuṇṭho ujuko kuṭilo tambo kāḷo odāto
tika-s0404t:520_16: hotī”tiādinā pajānāti. Sabbaññubuddhānaṃ eva hi etaṃ balaṃ, na aññesaṃ.
tika-s0404t:521_0: Nānādhimuttikatanti nānajjhāsayataṃ. Adhimutti nāma ajjhāsayadhātu ajjhāsayasabhāvo.
tika-s0404t:521_1: So pana hīnapaṇītatāsāmaññena pāḷiyaṃ dvidhāva vuttopi hīnapaṇītādibhedena anekavidhoti
tika-s0404t:521_2: āha “hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāva”nti. Tattha ye ye sattā yaṃyaṃadhimuttikā,
tika-s0404t:521_3: te te taṃtadadhimuttike eva sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti dhātusabhāgato. Yathā
tika-s0404t:521_4: gūthādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ sabhāvo eso, yaṃ gūthādīhi eva saṃsandanti samenti, evaṃ hīnajjhāsayā
tika-s0404t:521_5: dussīlādīheva saṃsandanti samenti, sampannasīlādayo ca sampannasīlādīheva. Taṃ nesaṃ
tika-s0404t:522_0: Vuddhiṃ hāniñcāti paccayavisesena sāmatthiyato adhikataṃ anadhikatañca. Indriyaparopariyattañāṇaniddese
tika-s0404t:522_1: “āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānātī”ti āsayādijānanaṃ kasmā niddiṭṭhanti? Āsayajānanādinā
tika-s0404t:522_2: yehi indriyehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti, tesaṃ jānanassa vibhāvanato.
tika-s0404t:522_4: visuṃ balavatā ca siddhā hoti. Tattha āsayanti yattha sattā nivasanti, taṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0404t:522_5: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhigataṃ vā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ vā āsayo, anusayo appahīnabhāvena thāmagato
tika-s0404t:522_6: kileso. Taṃ pana bhagavā sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto tesaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ vipassanāmaggañāṇānañca
tika-s0404t:523_0: “Kāmaṃ sevantaṃyeva bhagavā jānāti – ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0404t:523_1: Kāmaṃ sevantaṃyeva jānāti – ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0404t:523_2: Nekkhammaṃ sevantaṃyeva jānāti. Byāpādaṃ, abyāpādaṃ, thinamiddhaṃ, ālokasaññaṃ sevantaṃyeva
tika-s0404t:524_0: Paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānanti rūpāvacarānaṃ paṭhamādīnaṃ paccanīkajjhāpanaṭṭhena
tika-s0404t:524_1: ārammaṇūpanijjhāpanaṭṭhena ca jhānānaṃ. Catukkanayena hetaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānanti
tika-s0404t:524_2: ettha paṭipāṭiyā satta appitappitakkhaṇe paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato ārammaṇe ca
tika-s0404t:524_3: adhimuccanato vimokkhā nāma. Aṭṭhamo pana sabbaso saññāvedayitehi vimuttattā apagamavimokkho
tika-s0404t:524_4: nāma. Catukkanayapañcakanayesu paṭhamajjhānasamādhi savitakkasavicāro nāma. Pañcakanaye
tika-s0404t:524_5: dutiyajjhānasamādhi avitakkavicāramatto. Nayadvayepi upari tīsu jhānesu samādhi avitakkaavicāro.
tika-s0404t:524_6: Samāpattīsu paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhannaṃ samādhītipi nāmaṃ, samāpattītipi cittekaggatāsabbhāvato,
tika-s0404t:524_7: nirodhasamāpattiyā tadabhāvato na samādhīti nāmaṃ. Hānabhāgiyadhammanti appaguṇehi
tika-s0404t:524_11: dhammāti dassitāni. Tehi pana jhānānaṃ taṃsabhāvatā ca dhammasaddena vuttā. Tasmāti
tika-s0404t:524_12: vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati. Vodānanti paguṇatāsaṅkhātaṃ vodānaṃ. Tañhi
tika-s0404t:524_14: vuttaṃ. Keci pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānanti pāḷi natthī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:524_16: paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā. Yo samāpattilābhī samāno eva “na lābhīmhī”ti,
tika-s0404t:524_17: kammaṭṭhānaṃ samānaṃ eva “na kammaṭṭhāna”nti saññī hoti, so sampattiṃyeva samānaṃ
tika-s0404t:525_0: Na tathā daṭṭhabbanti yathā paravādinā vuttaṃ, tathā na daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakasakakiccameva
tika-s0404t:525_1: jānātīti ṭhānāṭṭhānajānanādisakasakameva kiccaṃ kātuṃ jānāti, yathāsakameva visayaṃ
tika-s0404t:525_2: paṭivijjhatīti attho. Tampīti tehi dasabalañāṇehi jānitabbampi. Kammavipākantaramevāti
tika-s0404t:525_5: dhātunānattakāraṇanti ekadesasarūpekaseso daṭṭhabbo. Tañhi ñāṇaṃ tadubhayampi jānāti.
tika-s0404t:525_6: “Imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā”tiādinā tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ. Saccaparicchedamevāti
tika-s0404t:525_7: pariññābhisamayādivasena saccānaṃ paricchinnameva. Appetuṃ na sakkoti aṭṭhamanavamabalāni
tika-s0404t:525_8: viya taṃsadisaṃ, iddhividhañāṇamiva vikubbituṃ. Etenassa balasadisatañca nivāreti.
tika-s0404t:525_9: Jhānādiñāṇaṃ viya vā appetuṃ vikubbituñca. Yadipi hi jhānādipaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sattamabalanti
tika-s0404t:525_10: tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā, tathāpi jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthīti jhānādisahagataṃ
tika-s0404t:525_11: ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ
tika-s0404t:525_12: viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ, iddhi hutvā
tika-s0404t:525_13: vikubbituñca na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ, na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:526: Evaṃ kiccavisesavasenapi dasabalañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇavisesaṃ dassetvā idāni vitakkattikabhūmantaravasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭipāṭiyātiādito paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-s0404t:527_0: Anupadavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā veditabbānīti sambandho. Kilesāvaraṇaṃ niyatamicchādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0404t:527_1: Kilesāvaraṇassa abhāvo āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ, tabbhāvo aṭṭhānaṃ. Anadhigamassa
tika-s0404t:527_2: pana tadubhayampi yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ ṭhānañcāti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “lokiya…pe…
tika-s0404t:527_3: dassanato cā”ti āha. Tattha lokiyasammādiṭṭhiyā ṭhiti āsavakkhayādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0404t:527_4: kilesāvaraṇābhāvassa kāraṇattā. Sā hi tasmiṃ sati na hoti, asati ca hoti. Etena tassā
tika-s0404t:527_5: aṭṭhitiyā tassa aṭṭhānatā vuttā eva. Nesaṃ veneyyasattānaṃ. Dhātuvemattadassanatoti
tika-s0404t:527_6: kāmadhātuādīnaṃ pavattibhedadassanato, yadaggena dhātuvemattaṃ jānāti, tadaggena
tika-s0404t:527_8: Sabbāpi hi cariyā dhammadhātupariyāpannā evāti. Payogaṃ anādiyitvāpi santatimahāmattādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t:527_9: viya. Dibbacakkhānubhāvato pattabbenāti ettha dibbacakkhunā parassa hadayavatthusannissayalohitavaṇṇadassanamukhena
tika-s0404t:527_10: tadā pavattamānacittajānanatthaṃ parikammakaraṇaṃ nāma sāvakānaṃ, tañca kho ādikammikānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:527_11: yato dibbacakkhuānubhāvato cetopariyañāṇassa pattabbatā siyā. Buddhānaṃ pana yadipi
tika-s0404t:527_13: natthi vijjāttayasiddhiyā sijjhanato. Sesābhiññāttaye cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamena
tika-s0404t:527_14: pattanti ca vattabbataṃ labhatīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:530_0: 22-24. Dutiye adhivacanapadānanti paññattipadānaṃ. Dāsādīsu sirivaḍḍhakādisaddā viya
tika-s0404t:530_1: vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattiyā adhivacanaṃ paññatti. Atha vā adhisaddo
tika-s0404t:530_2: uparibhāge. Vuccatīti vacanaṃ, upari vacanaṃ adhivacanaṃ, upādābhūtarūpādīnaṃ upari
tika-s0404t:530_3: paññapiyamānā upādāpaññattīti attho, tasmā paññattidīpakapadānīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:530_4: Tassa padāni padaṭṭhānāni adhivacanapadāni. Tenāha “tesaṃ ye”tiādi. Tesanti adhivacanānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:530_5: Yeti khandhādayo. Adhivuttitāya adhivuttiyoti diṭṭhiyo vuccanti. Adhikañhi sabhāvadhammesu
tika-s0404t:530_6: sassatādiṃ, pakatiādiṃ, drabyādiṃ, jīvādiṃ, kāyādiñca, abhūtaṃ atthaṃ ajjhāropetvā
tika-s0404t:530_7: diṭṭhiyo pavattantīti. Tenāha “atha vā”tiādi. Tatiyacatutthāni suviññeyyāni.
tika-s0404t:533_0: 25. Pañcame sakalaṭṭhenāti nissesaṭṭhena. Anavasesapharaṇavasena cettha sakalaṭṭho
tika-s0404t:533_1: veditabbo, asubhanimittādīsu viya ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesato gahetabbaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0404t:533_2: attho. Tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānanti taṃ kasiṇaṃ ārabbha pavattanakadhammānaṃ. Khettaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0404t:533_3: uppattiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. Adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti pavattiṭṭhānabhāvena. Yathā khettaṃ sassānaṃ
tika-s0404t:533_4: uppattiṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhanaṭṭhānañca, evameva taṃ ta jhānaṃ sampayuttadhammānanti. Yogino
tika-s0404t:533_5: vā sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvena. Paricchinditvāti idaṃ “uddhaṃ adho tiriya”nti etthāpi
tika-s0404t:533_6: yojetabbaṃ. Paricchinditvā eva hi sabbattha kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Tena tena vā kāraṇenāti
tika-s0404t:533_7: tena tena upariādīsu kasiṇavaḍḍhanakāraṇena. Yathā kinti āha “ālokamiva rūpadassanakāmo”ti.
tika-s0404t:533_8: Yathā dibbacakkhunā uddhaṃ ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo, uddhaṃ ālokaṃ pasāreti. Adho ce,
tika-s0404t:533_9: adho. Samantato ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo, samantato ālokaṃ pasāreti, evaṃ sabbakasiṇanti
tika-s0404t:533_10: attho. Ekassāti pathavīkasiṇādīsu ekekassa. Aññabhāvānupagamanatthanti aññakasiṇabhāvānupagamanadīpanatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t:533_11: aññassa vā kasiṇabhāvānupagamanadīpanatthaṃ. Na hi aññena pasāritakasiṇaṃ tato aññena
tika-s0404t:533_12: pasāritakasiṇabhāvaṃ upagacchati, evampi nesaṃ aññakasiṇasambhedābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:533_13: Na aññaṃ pathavīādi. Na hi udakena ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi. Aññakasiṇasambhedoti
tika-s0404t:534_0: Ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesapharaṇaṃ pamāṇassa aggahaṇato appamāṇaṃ. Teneva hi nesaṃ
tika-s0404t:534_1: kasiṇasamaññā. Tathā cāha “tañhī”tiādi. Tattha cetasā pharantoti bhāvanācittena ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0404t:534_2: karonto. Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ vā vipulaṃ vā sakalameva manasi karoti,
tika-s0404t:534_3: na ekadesaṃ. Kasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaviññāṇaṃ pharaṇaappamāṇavasena viññāṇakasiṇanti
tika-s0404t:534_4: vuttaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ viññāṇanti vuccati. Kasiṇavasenāti ugghāṭitakasiṇavasena kasiṇugghāṭimākāse
tika-s0404t:534_5: uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā. Yattakañhi ṭhānaṃ kasiṇaṃ pasāritaṃ, tattakaṃ ākāsabhāvanāvasena
tika-s0404t:534_6: ākāsaṃ hotīti. Evaṃ yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitaṃ, tattakaṃ sakalameva
tika-s0404t:534_7: pharitvā viññāṇassa pavattanato āgamanavasena viññāṇakasiṇepi uddhaṃadhotiriyatā
tika-s0404t:534_8: vuttāti āha “kasiṇugghāṭimākāsavasena tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0404t:537_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe atthassa pattinti ekantato hitānuppattiṃ. Hadayassa santinti paramacittūpasamaṃ.
tika-s0404t:537_1: Kilesasenanti kāmaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ paṭhamaṃ kilesasenaṃ. Sā hi kilesasenā accharāsaṅghātasabhāvāpi
tika-s0404t:537_3: kiccavasena. Ahaṃ ekova jhāyantoti ahaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca abhāvato
tika-s0404t:537_4: eko asahāyo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyanto. Anubujjhinti anukkamena maggapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0404t:537_5: bujjhiṃ paṭivijjhiṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ senaṃ jinitvā ahaṃ ekova
tika-s0404t:537_6: jhāyanto “atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa santi”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ arahattasukhaṃ paṭivijjhiṃ,
tika-s0404t:537_7: tasmā janena mittasanthavaṃ na karomi, teneva ca me kāraṇena kenaci saddhiṃ sakkhī
tika-s0404t:537_8: na sampajjatīti. Atthābhinibbattesunti itisaddalopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha “atthoti gahetvā”ti.
tika-s0404t:540_0: 27. Sattame vuccethāti vucceyya. Dutiyapadepīti “anusāsaniyā vā anusāsani”nti evaṃ
tika-s0404t:540_1: dutiyavākyepi. Te kira bhikkhū. Na ceva sampāyissantīti na ceva sammadeva pakārehi
tika-s0404t:540_2: gahessanti ñāpessanti. Tenāha “sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti. Yasmā avisaye
tika-s0404t:540_3: pañhaṃ pucchitā honti, tasmā vighātaṃ āpajjissantīti yojanā. Aññathā ārādhanaṃ nāma
tika-s0404t:540_4: natthīti iminā sapaccayanāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvato avabodho eva ito bāhirakānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0404t:540_5: kuto pavedanāti dasseti. Ārādhananti yāthāvapavedanena cittassa paritosanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:541_0: Eko pañhoti eko pañhamaggo, ekaṃ pañhagavesananti attho. Eko uddesoti ekaṃ uddisanaṃ
tika-s0404t:541_1: atthassa saṃkhittavacanaṃ. Veyyākaraṇanti niddisanaṃ atthassa vivaritvā kathanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:541_3: nayena yathā ime saṅkhārā etarahi, evaṃ atīte anāgate ca aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā
tika-s0404t:542_0: Sabbe sattāti anavasesā sattā. Te pana bhavabhedato saṅkhepeneva bhinditvā dassento
tika-s0404t:542_2: āha “āhārato ṭhiti etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti. Tiṭṭhati etenāti vā ṭhiti, āhāro ṭhiti
tika-s0404t:542_3: etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikāti evaṃ vā ettha samāsaviggaho daṭṭhabbo. Āhāraṭṭhitikāti paccayaṭṭhitikā,
tika-s0404t:542_4: paccayāyattavuttikāti attho. Paccayattho hettha āhārasaddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa
tika-s0404t:542_5: vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu viya. Evañhi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattā
tika-s0404t:542_6: pariggahitā honti. Sā panāyaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikatā nippariyāyato saṅkhāradhammo. Tenāhu
tika-s0404t:542_7: aṭṭhakathācariyā “āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo”ti. Yadi evaṃ
tika-s0404t:542_8: “sabbe sattā”ti idaṃ kathanti? Puggalādhiṭṭhānadesanāti nāyaṃ doso. Tenevāha – “ekadhamme,
tika-s0404t:542_9: bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī
tika-s0404t:542_10: sammadatthaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamasmiṃ ekadhamme?
tika-s0404t:542_11: Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti. Yvāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0404t:542_12: paccayāyattavuttitāya āhārapariyāyena sāmaññato paccayadhammo vutto, ayaṃ āhāro nāma eko dhammo.
tika-s0404t:543_0: Codako vuttampi atthaṃ yāthāvato appaṭivijjhamāno neyyatthaṃ suttapadaṃ nītatthato
tika-s0404t:543_1: dahanto “sabbe sattā”ti vacanamatte ṭhatvā “nanu cā”tiādinā codeti. Ācariyo aviparītaṃ
tika-s0404t:543_2: tattha yathādhippetamatthaṃ pavedento “na virujjhatī”ti vatvā “tesañhi jhānaṃ āhāro
tika-s0404t:543_3: hotī”ti āha. Jhānanti ekavokārabhavāvahaṃ saññāya virajjanavasena pavattarūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:543_4: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anāhārā”ti vacanaṃ asaññabhave catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:543_5: na paccayāhārassa abhāvato. Evaṃ santepīti idaṃ sāsane yesu dhammesu visesato āhārasaddo
tika-s0404t:543_6: niruḷho, “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha yadi teyeva gayhanti, abyāpitadosamāpanno. Atha
tika-s0404t:543_7: sabbopi paccayadhammo āhāroti adhippeto, imāya āhārapāḷiyā virodho āpannoti dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t:543_8: āraddhaṃ. “Na virujjhatī”ti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ, taṃ vivaranto “etasmiñhi sutte”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:543_9: Kabaḷīkārāhārādīnaṃ ojaṭṭhamakarūpāharaṇādi nippariyāyena āhārabhāvo. Yathā hi kabaḷīkārāhāro
tika-s0404t:543_10: ojaṭṭhamakarūpāharaṇena rūpakāyaṃ upatthambhenti, evaṃ phassādayo vedanādiāharaṇena
tika-s0404t:543_11: nāmakāyaṃ upatthambheti, tasmā satipi janakabhāve upatthambhakabhāvo ojādīsu sātisayo
tika-s0404t:543_12: labbhamāno mukhyo āhāraṭṭhoti te eva nippariyāyena āhāralakkhaṇā dhammā vuttā.
tika-s0404t:544_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte pariyāyena paccayo āhāroti vutto, sabbo paccayadhammo attano
tika-s0404t:544_1: phalaṃ āharatīti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ labhatīti. Tenāha “sabbadhammānañhī”tiādi. Tattha
tika-s0404t:544_2: sabbadhammānanti sabbesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttena samatthetuṃ
tika-s0404t:544_3: “tenevāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayanti paccayāhāro. Nippariyāyāhāropi gahitova hotīti yāvatā
tika-s0404t:544_4: sopi paccayabhāveneva janako upatthambhako ca hutvā taṃ taṃ phalaṃ āharatīti vattabbataṃ labhatīti.
tika-s0404t:545_0: Tatthāti pariyāyāhāro, nippariyāyāhāroti dvīsu āhāresu asaññabhave yadipi nippariyāyāhāro
tika-s0404t:545_1: na labbhati, pariyāyāhāro pana labbhateva. Idāni tamevatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t:545_2: “anuppanne hi buddhe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Uppanne buddhe titthakaramatanissitānaṃ jhānabhāvanāya
tika-s0404t:545_3: asijjhanato “anuppanne buddhe”ti vuttaṃ. Sāsanikā tādisaṃ jhānaṃ na nibbattentīti
tika-s0404t:545_4: “titthāyatane pabbajitā”ti vuttaṃ. Titthiyā hi upapattivisese vimuttisaññino saññāvirāgāvirāgesu
tika-s0404t:545_5: ādīnavānisaṃsadassinova hutvā asaññasamāpattiṃ nibbattetvā akkhaṇabhūmiyaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-s0404t:545_6: na sāsanikā. Vāyokasiṇe parikkammaṃ katvāti vāyokasiṇe paṭhamādīni tīṇi jhānāni nibbattetvā
tika-s0404t:545_7: tatiyajjhāne ciṇṇavasī hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya catutthajjhānādhigamāya parikammaṃ katvā.
tika-s0404t:546_0: Kasmā panettha vāyokasiṇeyeva parikammaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate, yatheva hi rūpapaṭibhāgabhūtesu
tika-s0404t:546_2: evaṃ aparibyattaviggahatāya arūpapaṭibhāgabhūte kasiṇavisese arūpavibhāvanena arūpavirāgabhāvanā
tika-s0404t:546_3: saṅkhāto rūpasamāpattiviseso adhigamīyatīti. Ettha ca “saññā rogo, saññā gaṇḍo”tiādinā,
tika-s0404t:546_4: “dhi cittaṃ, dhi vatetaṃ citta”ntiādinā ca nayena arūpappavattiyā ādīnavadassanena
tika-s0404t:546_5: tadabhāve ca santapaṇītabhāvasanniṭṭhānena rūpasamāpattiyā abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ arūpavirāgabhāvanā.
tika-s0404t:546_6: Rūpavirāgabhāvanā pana saddhiṃ upacārena arūpasamāpattiyo, tatthāpi visesena paṭhamāruppajjhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:546_7: Yadi evaṃ “paricchinnākāsakasiṇepī”ti vattabbaṃ, tassāpi arūpapaṭibhāgatā labbhatīti?
tika-s0404t:546_8: Icchitamevetaṃ, kesañci avacanaṃ panettha pubbācariyehi aggahitabhāvena. Yathā hi
tika-s0404t:546_10: ca visayavisese pātubhavati, evaṃ arūpavirāgabhāvanāpīti vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-s0404t:546_11: Titthiyeheva pana tassā samāpattiyā paṭipajjitabbatāya tesañca visayapathe sūpanibandhanasseva
tika-s0404t:546_12: tassa jhānassa paṭipattito diṭṭhivantehi pubbācariyehi catuttheyeva bhūtakasiṇe arūpavirāgabhāvanāparikammaṃ
tika-s0404t:546_13: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñca vaṇṇakasiṇesu viya purimabhūtakasiṇattayepi vaṇṇappaṭicchāyāva
tika-s0404t:546_14: paṇṇatti ārammaṇaṃ jhānassa lokavohārānurodheneva pavattito. Evañca katvā visuddhimagge
tika-s0404t:546_15: pathavīkasiṇassa ādāsacandamaṇḍalūpamavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti, catutthaṃ pana
tika-s0404t:546_16: bhūtakasiṇaṃ bhūtappaṭicchāyameva jhānassa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatīti tassevaṃ arūpapaṭibhāgatā
tika-s0404t:547_0: Dhīti jigucchanatthe nipāto, tasmā dhi cittanti cittaṃ jigucchāmi. Dhi vatetaṃ cittanti
tika-s0404t:547_1: etaṃ mama cittaṃ jigucchitaṃ vata hotu. Vatāti sambhāvane. Tena jigucchanaṃ sambhāvento
tika-s0404t:547_2: vadati. Nāmāti ca sambhāvane eva. Tena cittassa abhāvaṃ sambhāveti. Cittassa bhāvābhāvesu
tika-s0404t:547_3: ādīnavānisaṃse dassetuṃ “cittañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvāti cittassa
tika-s0404t:547_4: abhāvo eva sādhu suṭṭhūti imaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiṃ tattha ca abhiruciṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0404t:547_5: Tathā bhāvitassa jhānassa ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvappattiyā aparihīnajjhānā. Titthāyatane
tika-s0404t:547_6: pabbajitasseva tathā jhānabhāvanā hotīti āha “manussaloke”ti. Paṇihito ahosīti maraṇassa
tika-s0404t:547_7: āsannakāle ṭhapito ahosi. Yadi ṭhānādinā ākārena nibbatteyya kammabalena, yāva bhedā
tika-s0404t:547_8: tenevākārena tiṭṭheyyāti āha “tena iriyāpathenā”tiādi. Evarūpānampīti evaṃ acetanānampi.
tika-s0404t:547_9: Pi-saddena pageva sacetanānanti dasseti. Kathaṃ pana acetanānaṃ nesaṃ paccayāhārassa
tika-s0404t:547_10: upakappananti codanaṃ sandhāya tattha nidassanaṃ dassento “yathā”tiādimāha. Tena
tika-s0404t:547_11: na kevalamāgamoyeva, ayamettha yuttīti dasseti. Tāva tiṭṭhantīti ukkaṃsato pañca
tika-s0404t:548_0: Ye uṭṭhānavīriyena divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā
tika-s0404t:548_1: jīvikaṃ kappenti, te uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino. Ye pana attano puññaphalameva upajīvanti,
tika-s0404t:548_2: te puññaphalūpajīvino. Nerayikānaṃ pana neva uṭṭhānavīriyavasena jīvikakappanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:548_3: puññaphalassa pana lesopi natthīti vuttaṃ “ye pana nerayikā…pe… jīvīti vuttā”ti.
tika-s0404t:548_4: Paṭisandhiviññāṇassa āharaṇena manosañcetanā āhāroti vuttā, na yassa kassaci phalassāti
tika-s0404t:548_5: adhippāyena “kiṃ pañca āhārā atthī”ti codeti. Ācariyo nippariyāyāhāre adhippete “siyā
tika-s0404t:548_6: tava codanā avasarā, sā pana ettha anavasarā”ti ca dassento “pañca, na pañcāti idaṃ
tika-s0404t:548_7: na vattabba”nti vatvā pariyāyāhārasseva panettha adhippetabhāvaṃ dassento “nanu paccayo
tika-s0404t:548_8: āhāro’ti vuttameta”nti āha. Tasmāti yassa kassaci paccayassa āhāroti icchitattā.
tika-s0404t:549_1: vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ nerayikā sukhappaṭisaṃvedinopi hontīti? Noti dassetuṃ “kheḷo hī”tiādi
tika-s0404t:549_2: vuttaṃ. Tayoti tayo arūpāhārā kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāvato. Avasesānanti asaññasattehi
tika-s0404t:549_3: avasesānaṃ kāmabhavādīsu nibbattasattānaṃ. Paccayāhāro hi sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇoti.
tika-s0404t:552_0: 28-29. Aṭṭhame evaṃnāmaketi kajaṅgalāti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmake majjhimappadesassa
tika-s0404t:552_1: mariyādabhūte nagare. “Nigame”tipi vadanti, “niculavane”tipi vadanti. Niculaṃ nāma
tika-s0404t:552_2: ekā rukkhajāti, “nīparukkho”tipi vadanti. Tena sañchanno mahāvanasaṇḍo, tattha viharatīti
tika-s0404t:552_3: attho. Hetunā nayenāti ca heṭṭhā vuttameva. Nanu ca “eso ceva tassa attho”ti kasmā
tika-s0404t:552_4: vuttaṃ. Bhagavatā hi cattārotiādipañhabyākaraṇā cattāro āhārā, pañcupādānakkhandhā,
tika-s0404t:552_5: cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, aṭṭha lokadhammā dassitā. Bhikkhuniyā
tika-s0404t:552_6: pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, pañcindriyāni, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, satta bojjhaṅgā,
tika-s0404t:552_7: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti dassitadhammā aññoyevattho bhikkhuniyā dassitoti codanaṃ
tika-s0404t:555_0: 30. Dasame uggantvā yujjhati etāyāti uyyodhikā, satthappahārehi yujjhitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:555_1: Uggantvā yujjhanaṃ vā uyyodhiko, satthappahāro. Tenāha “yuddhato nivatto”ti. Upassutivasena
tika-s0404t:555_2: yujjhitabbākāraṃ ñatvāti jetavane kira dattatthero dhanuggahatissattheroti dve mahallakattherā
tika-s0404t:555_3: vihārapaccante paṇṇasālāya vasanti. Tesu dhanuggahatissatthero pacchimayāme pabujjhitvā
tika-s0404t:555_4: uṭṭhāya nisinno dattattheraṃ āmantetvā “ayaṃ te mahodaro kosalo bhuttabhattameva
tika-s0404t:555_5: pūtiṃ karoti, yuddhavicāraṇaṃ pana kiñci na jānāti, parājitotveva vadāpetī”ti vatvā
tika-s0404t:555_6: tena “kiṃ pana kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte – “bhante, yuddho nāma padumabyūho cakkabyūho
tika-s0404t:555_7: sakaṭabyūhoti tayo byūhā honti, ajātasattuṃ gaṇhitukāmena asukasmiṃ nāma pabbatakucchismiṃ
tika-s0404t:555_8: dvīsu pabbatabhittīsu manusse ṭhapetvā purato dubbalaṃ dassetvā pabbatantaraṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0404t:555_9: jānitvā paviṭṭhamaggaṃ rundhitvā purato ca pacchato ca ubhosu pabbatabhittīsu vaggitvā
tika-s0404t:555_10: naditvā jālapakkhittamacchaṃ viya katvā sakkā gahetu”nti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe “bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0404t:555_11: kathāsallāpaṃ suṇāthā”ti rañño pesitacarapurisā taṃ sutvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā
tika-s0404t:555_12: rājā saṅgāmabheriṃ paharāpetvā gantvā sakaṭabyūhaṃ katvā ajātasattuṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gaṇhi.
tika-s0404t:556_0: Doṇapākanti doṇataṇḍulānaṃ pakkabhattaṃ. Doṇanti catunāḷikānametamadhivacanaṃ. Manujassāti
tika-s0404t:556_1: sattassa. Tanukassāti tanukā appikā assa puggalassa, bhuttapaccayā visabhāgavedanā
tika-s0404t:556_2: na honti. Saṇikanti mandaṃ mudukaṃ, aparissayamevāti attho. Jīratīti paribhuttāhāro
tika-s0404t:556_3: paccati. Āyu pālayanti nirogo avedano jīvitaṃ rakkhanto. Atha vā saṇikaṃ jīratīti
tika-s0404t:556_4: so bhojane mattaññū puggalo parimitāhāratāya saṇikaṃ cirena jīrati jaraṃ pāpuṇāti jīvitaṃ pālayanto.
tika-s0404t:557_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ adāsīti ekasmiṃ kira samaye rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanaṃ tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena
tika-s0404t:557_1: bhuñjati. So ekadivasaṃ bhuttapātarāso bhattasammadaṃ avinodetvā satthu santikaṃ
tika-s0404t:557_2: gantvā kilantarūpo ito cito ca samparivattati, niddāya abhibhuyyamānopi lahukaṃ nipajjituṃ
tika-s0404t:557_3: asakkonto ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Atha naṃ satthā āha “kiṃ, mahārāja, avissamitvāva āgatosī”ti.
tika-s0404t:557_4: Āma, bhante, bhuttakālato paṭṭhāya me mahādukkhaṃ hotīti. Atha naṃ satthā, “mahārāja,
tika-s0404t:562: Imāya gāthāya ovaditvā, “mahārāja, bhojanaṃ nāma mattāya bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, mattabhojino hi sukhaṃ hotī”ti uttaripi puna ovadanto “manujassa sadā satīmato”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
tika-s0404t:563_0: Rājā pana gāthaṃ uggaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi, samīpe ṭhitaṃ pana bhāgineyyaṃ sudassanaṃ nāma
tika-s0404t:563_1: māṇavaṃ “imaṃ gāthaṃ uggaṇha tātā”ti āha. So taṃ gāthaṃ uggaṇhitvā “kiṃ karomi, bhante”ti
tika-s0404t:563_2: satthāraṃ pucchi. Atha naṃ satthā āha, “māṇava, imaṃ gāthaṃ naṭo viya pattapattaṭṭhāne
tika-s0404t:563_3: mā avaca, rañño pātarāsaṃ bhuñjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭhamapiṇḍādīsupi avatvā avasāne
tika-s0404t:563_4: piṇḍe gahite vadeyyāsi, rājā sutvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ chaḍḍessati. Atha rañño hatthesu
tika-s0404t:563_5: dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tāvatake
tika-s0404t:563_6: taṇḍule hāreyyāsi. Pātarāse ca vatvā sāyamāse mā vadeyyāsī”ti. So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā
tika-s0404t:563_7: taṃ divasaṃ rañño pātarāsaṃ bhutvā gatattā sāyamāse bhagavato anusiṭṭhiniyāmena gāthaṃ
tika-s0404t:563_8: abhāsi. Rājā dasabalassa vacanaṃ saritvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ pātiyaṃyeva chaḍḍesi. Rañño
tika-s0404t:563_9: hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā punadivase tattake taṇḍule hariṃsu,
tika-s0404t:563_10: sopi māṇavo divase divase tathāgatassa santikaṃ gacchati. Dasabalassa vissāsiko ahosi.
tika-s0404t:563_11: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ pucchi “rājā kittakaṃ bhuñjatī”ti? So “nāḷikodana”nti āha. Vaṭṭissati
tika-s0404t:563_12: ettāvatā purisabhāgo esa, ito paṭṭhāya gāthaṃ mā vadīti. Rājā tatheva saṇṭhāsi. Tena
tika-s0404t:563_13: vuttaṃ “nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhāsī”ti. Rattaññutāya vaḍḍhitaṃ sīlaṃ assa atthīti
tika-s0404t:563_14: vaḍḍhitasīlo. Apothujjanikehi sīlehīti catupārisuddhisīlehi sīlaṃ ariyaṃ suddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:563_15: Tena vuttaṃ “ariyasīlo”ti. Tadekaṃ anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “kusalasīlo”ti.
tika-s0404t:568_0: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame atthavaseti vuddhivisese, sikkhāpadapaññattihetu adhigamanīye
tika-s0404t:568_1: hitaviseseti attho. Atthoyeva vā atthavaso, dasa atthe dasa kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:568_2: Atha vā attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso, hetūti evampettha
tika-s0404t:568_3: attho daṭṭhabbo. “Ye mama sotabbaṃ saddahātabbaṃ maññissanti, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ
tika-s0404t:568_4: hitāya sukhāyā”ti vuttattā “yo ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati, tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ
tika-s0404t:568_5: hitāya sukhāya saṃvattatī”ti vuttaṃ. Asampaṭicchane ādīnavanti bhaddālisutte viya
tika-s0404t:568_6: asampaṭicchane ādīnavaṃ dassetvā. Sukhavihārābhāve sahajīvamānassa abhāvato sahajīvitāpi
tika-s0404t:568_7: sukhavihārova vutto. Sukhavihāro nāma catunnaṃ iriyāpathavihārānaṃ phāsutā.
tika-s0404t:569: Maṅkutanti nittejataṃ. Dhammenātiādīsu dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu. Vinayoti codanā ceva sāraṇā ca. Satthusāsananti ñattisampadā ceva anussāvanasampadā ca.
tika-s0404t:570_0: Piyasīlānanti sikkhākāmānaṃ. Tesañhi sīlaṃ piyaṃ hoti. Tenevāha “sikkhāttayapāripūriyā
tika-s0404t:570_1: ghaṭamānā”ti. Sandiddhamanāti saṃsayaṃ āpajjamanā. Ubbaḷhā hontīti pīḷitā honti.
tika-s0404t:570_2: Saṅghakammānīti satipi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ saṅghakammabhāve gobalībaddañāyena uposathaṃ
tika-s0404t:570_3: pavāraṇañca ṭhapetvā upasampadādisesasaṅghakammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Samaggānaṃ bhāvo sāmaggī.
tika-s0404t:571: “Nāhaṃ, cunda, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
tika-s0404t:574: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
tika-s0404t:575_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
tika-s0404t:575_1: ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā āsavāti āha “asaṃvare ṭhitena tasmiṃyeva
tika-s0404t:575_2: attabhāve pattabbā”tiādi. Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na ca paññapeyya, tato asaddhammappaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu
tika-s0404t:575_3: ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā, ye ca tannimittameva
tika-s0404t:575_5: anatthā, te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ
tika-s0404t:575_6: āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha bhavā diṭṭhadhammikā.
tika-s0404t:575_7: Tena vuttaṃ “tasmiṃyeva attabhāve pattabbā”ti. Sammukhā garahanaṃ akitti, parammukhā
tika-s0404t:575_8: garahanaṃ ayaso. Atha vā sammukhā parammukhā garahanaṃ akitti, parivārahāni ayasoti
tika-s0404t:577_0: Saṃvaravinayoti sīlasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti
tika-s0404t:577_1: pañcavidho saṃvaro. Yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t:577_2: saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, vinayanato vinayoti vuccati. Pahānavinayoti tadaṅgappahānaṃ
tika-s0404t:577_4: pañcavidhaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ, vinayaṭṭhena vinayo, tasmā “pahānavinayo”ti
tika-s0404t:577_5: vuccati. Samathavinayoti satta adhikaraṇasamathā. Paññattivinayoti sikkhāpadameva.
tika-s0404t:577_6: Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato paññattivinayopi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
tika-s0404t:582_0: 41-48. Pañcamassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Chaṭṭhe khaṇabhaṅguratāya na niccā na
tika-s0404t:582_1: dhuvāti aniccā. Tato eva paṇḍitehi na iccā na upagantabbātipi aniccā. Svāyaṃ nesaṃ
tika-s0404t:582_2: aniccaṭṭho udayavayaparicchinnatāya veditabboti āha “hutvā abhāvino”ti, uppajjitvā
tika-s0404t:582_3: vinassakāti attho. Sārarahitāti niccasāradhuvasāraattasāravirahitā. Musāti visaṃvādanaṭṭhena
tika-s0404t:582_4: musā, ekaṃsena asubhādisabhāvā te bālānaṃ subhādibhāvena upaṭṭhahanti, subhādiggahaṇassa
tika-s0404t:582_5: paccayabhāvena satte visaṃvādenti. Tenāha “niccasubhasukhā viyā”tiādi. Na passanasabhāvāti
tika-s0404t:582_6: khaṇapabhaṅguratāittarapaccupaṭṭhānatāya dissamānā viya hutvā adassanapakatikā. Ete
tika-s0404t:582_7: hi khettaṃ viya vatthu viya hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ca paññāyitvāpi katipāheneva supinake
tika-s0404t:582_8: diṭṭhā viya na paññāyanti. Sattamaṭṭhamāni suviññeyyāni.
tika-s0404t:585_0: 49-50. Navame punabbhavadānaṃ punabbhavo uttarapadalopena, punabbhavo sīlamassāti
tika-s0404t:592_0: 51-60. Dutiyassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Dasame pittaṃ samuṭṭhānametesanti pittasamuṭṭhānā,
tika-s0404t:592_1: pittapaccayāpittahetukāti attho. Semhasamuṭṭhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Sannipātikāti
tika-s0404t:592_2: tiṇṇampi pittādīnaṃ kopena samuṭṭhitā. Utupariṇāmajāti visabhāgaututo jātā. Jaṅgaladesavāsīnañhi
tika-s0404t:592_3: anūpadese vasantānaṃ visabhāgo ca utu uppajjati, anūpadesavāsīnañca jaṅgaladeseti
tika-s0404t:592_4: evaṃ parasamuddatīrādivasenapi utuvisabhāgatā uppajjatiyeva. Tato jātāti utupariṇāmajā.
tika-s0404t:592_5: Attano pakaticariyānaṃ visayānaṃ visamaṃ kāyapariharaṇavasena jātā visamaparihārajā.
tika-s0404t:592_7: saṅgaho. Parassa upakkamato nibbattā opakkamikā. Bāhiraṃ paccayaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ
tika-s0404t:592_8: kammavipākatova jātā kammavipākajā. Tattha purimehi sattahi kāraṇehi uppannā sārīrikā
tika-s0404t:592_9: vedanā sakkā paṭibāhituṃ, kammavipākajānaṃ pana sabbabhesajjānipi sabbaparittānipi nālaṃ paṭighātāya.
tika-s0404t:597_0: 61-67. Dutiyassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Sattame naḷakapānaketi evaṃnāmake nigame.
tika-s0404t:597_1: Pubbe kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto kapiyoniyaṃ nibbatto mahākāyo kapirājā hutvā anekasatavānarasahassaparivuto
tika-s0404t:597_2: pabbatapāde vicari, paññavā kho pana hoti mahāpañño. So parisaṃ evaṃ ovadati, “tātā,
tika-s0404t:597_3: imasmiṃ pabbatapāde visaphalāni honti, amanussapariggahitā pokkharaṇikā nāma honti,
tika-s0404t:597_4: tumhe pubbe khāditapubbāneva phalāni khādatha, pītapubbāneva pānīyāni pivatha, ettha
tika-s0404t:597_5: vo paṭipucchitakiccaṃ natthī”ti. Te apītapubbaṃ disvā sahasāva apivitvā samantā paridhāvitvā
tika-s0404t:597_6: mahāsattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisīdiṃsu. Mahāsatto āgantvā “kiṃ, tātā, pānīyaṃ
tika-s0404t:597_7: na pivathā”ti āha. Tumhākaṃ āgamanaṃ olokemāti. “Sādhu, tātā”ti samantā padaṃ pariyesamāno
tika-s0404t:597_8: otiṇṇapadaṃyeva addasa, na uttiṇṇapadaṃ. Adisvā “saparissayā”ti aññāsi. Tāvadeva
tika-s0404t:597_9: ca tattha abhinibbattaamanusso udakaṃ dvedhā katvā uṭṭhāsi – setamukho, nīlakucchi,
tika-s0404t:597_10: rattahatthapādo, mahādāṭhiko, vantadāṭho, virūpo, bībhaccho, udakarakkhaso. So evamāha
tika-s0404t:597_11: – “kasmā pānīyaṃ na pivatha, madhuraṃ udakaṃ pivatha, kiṃ tumhe etassa vacanaṃ suṇāthā”ti.
tika-s0404t:597_12: Mahāsatto āha “tvaṃ adhivattho amanusso”ti? Āmāhanti. “Tvaṃ idha otiṇṇe labhasī”ti
tika-s0404t:597_13: āha. Āma, tumhe pana sabbe khādissāmīti. Na sakkhissasi yakkhāti. Pānīyaṃ pana pivissathāti.
tika-s0404t:597_14: Āma, pivissāmāti. Evaṃ sante ekampi vānaraṃ na muñcissanti. “Pānīyañca pivissāma,
tika-s0404t:597_15: na ca te vasaṃ gamissāmā”ti naḷaṃ āharāpetvā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā dhami. Sabbo ekacchiddo
tika-s0404t:597_16: ahosi. Tīre nisīditvāva pānīyaṃ pivi. Sesavānarānampi pāṭiyekkaṃ naḷaṃ āharāpetvā
tika-s0404t:597_17: dhamitvā adāsi. Sabbe te passantasseva pānīyaṃ piviṃsu. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-s0404t:599: Naḷena vāriṃ pissāma, neva maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasī”ti. ;
tika-s0404t:600_0: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva ajjadivasā tasmiṃ ṭhāne naḷā ekacchiddāva honti. Imasmiñhi kappe
tika-s0404t:600_1: kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyāni nāma cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ, vaṭṭajātake saccakiriyaṭṭhāne aggijālassa
tika-s0404t:600_2: āgamanupacchedo, ghaṭīkārassa mātāpitūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne anovassanaṃ, pokkharaṇiyā
tika-s0404t:600_3: tīre naḷānaṃ ekacchiddabhāvoti. Iti sā pokkharaṇī naḷena pānīyassa pivitattā “naḷakapānakā”ti
tika-s0404t:600_4: nāmaṃ labhi. Aparabhāge taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ nissāya nigamo patiṭṭhāsi, tassapi “naḷakapāna”ntveva
tika-s0404t:600_5: nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Taṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ “naḷakapāne”ti. Palāsavaneti kiṃsukavane.
tika-s0404t:601_0: Tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti byāpanicchāyaṃ idaṃ āmeḍitavacananti dassetuṃ “yaṃ yaṃ
tika-s0404t:601_1: disa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Anuviloketvāti ettha anu-saddo “parī”ti iminā samānatthoti āha
tika-s0404t:601_2: “tato tato viloketvā”ti. Kasmā āgilāyati koṭisahassahatthināgānaṃ balaṃ dhārentassāti
tika-s0404t:601_3: codakassa adhippāyo. Ācariyo panassa “esa saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvo, yadidaṃ aniccatā.
tika-s0404t:601_4: Ye pana aniccā, te ekanteneva udayavayappaṭipīḷitatāya dukkhā eva. Dukkhasabhāvesu
tika-s0404t:601_5: tesu satthukāye dukkhuppattiyā ayaṃ paccayo”ti dassetuṃ “bhagavato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:601_6: Piṭṭhivāto uppajji, so ca kho pubbekatakammapaccayā. Etthāha “kiṃ pana taṃ kammaṃ,
tika-s0404t:601_7: yena aparimāṇakālaṃ sakkaccaṃ upacitavipulapuññasambhāro satthā evarūpaṃ dukkhavipākamanubhavatī”ti?
tika-s0404t:601_8: Vuccate – ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto atītajātiyaṃ mallaputto hutvā pāpajanasevī
tika-s0404t:601_9: ayonisomanasikārabahulo carati. So ekadivasaṃ nibbuddhe vattamāne ekaṃ mallaputtaṃ
tika-s0404t:601_10: gahetvā gāḷhataraṃ nippīḷesi. Tena kammena idāni buddho hutvāpi dukkhamanubhavi.
tika-s0404t:601_11: Yathā cetaṃ, evaṃ ciñcamāṇavikādīnamitthīnaṃ yāni bhagavato abbhakkhānādīni dukkhāni,
tika-s0404t:601_12: sabbāni pubbekatassa vipākāvasesāni, yāni kammapilotikānīti vuccanti. Vuttañhetaṃ apadāne –
tika-s0404t:606: “Suṇātha bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
tika-s0404t:617: Taṃ abbhakkhāya niraye, ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ mayā.
tika-s0404t:652: Pāde chaviṃ pakappesi, na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
tika-s0404t:657: Sabbe sakkā ca haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho.
tika-s0404t:660: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
tika-s0404t:671: Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
tika-s0404t:682_0: 69-70. Navame duggatito saṃsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṃ, saggamaggo, mokkhamaggo
tika-s0404t:682_1: ca. Taṃ niyyānaṃ arahati, niyyāne vā niyuttā, niyyānaṃ vā phalabhūtaṃ etissā atthīti
tika-s0404t:682_2: niyyānikā. Vacīduccaritasaṃkilesato niyyātīti vā īkārassa rassattaṃ, yakārassa ca
tika-s0404t:682_3: kakāraṃ katvā niyyānikā, cetanāya saddhiṃ samphappalāpā veramaṇi. Tappaṭipakkhato
tika-s0404t:682_4: aniyyānikā, tassā bhāvo aniyyānikattaṃ, tasmā aniyyānikattā. Tiracchānabhūtanti tirokaraṇabhūtaṃ.
tika-s0404t:683_0: Saha atthenāti sātthakaṃ, hitappaṭisaṃyuttanti attho. “Surākathā”tipi pāṭhoti āha
tika-s0404t:683_1: “surākathanti pāḷiyaṃ panā”ti. Sā panesā kathā “evarūpā navasurā pītā ratijananī
tika-s0404t:683_2: hotī”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati, ādīnavavasena pana “ummattakasaṃvattanikā”tiādinā
tika-s0404t:683_3: nayena vaṭṭati. Tenāha “anekavidhaṃ…pe… ādīnavavasena vaṭṭatī”ti. Visikhāti gharasanniveso.
tika-s0404t:683_4: Visikhāgahaṇena ca tannivāsino gahitā “gāmo āgato”tiādīsu viya. Tenevāha “sūrā samatthā”ti
tika-s0404t:683_5: ca “saddhā pasannā”ti ca. Kumbhaṭṭhānappadesena kumbhadāsiyo vuttāti āha “kumbhadāsikathā vā”ti.
tika-s0404t:684_1: vimuttā. Uppattiṭhitisaṃhārādivasena lokaṃ akkhāyatīti lokakkhāyikā. Asukena nāmāti
tika-s0404t:684_2: pajāpatinā brahmunā, issarena vā. Vitaṇḍasallāpakathāti “aṭṭhīnaṃ setattā setoti
tika-s0404t:684_3: na vattabbo, pattānaṃ kāḷattā kāḷoti pana vattabbo”ti evamādikā. Ādi-saddena “selapupphalakāni
tika-s0404t:684_4: viya jīvidāvirapārayattivisālā natthi, yaṃ yo koci tiriyāmānā katattā”ti evamādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t:684_5: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sāgaradevenāti sāgaraputtarājūhi. Khatoti etaṃ ekavacanaṃ tehi
tika-s0404t:684_6: paccekaṃ khatattā “sāgaradevena khatattā”ti vuttaṃ. Sahamuddā samuddoti vutto. Bhavati
tika-s0404t:684_7: vaddhati etenāti bhavo. Bhavābhavā hontīti itibhavābhavakathā. Ettha ca bhavoti sassataṃ,
tika-s0404t:684_8: abhavoti ucchedaṃ. Bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti kāmasukhaṃ, abhavoti attakilamathoti
tika-s0404t:684_9: iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā nāma
tika-s0404t:684_10: honti. Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā itisaddena saṅgaṇhitvā
tika-s0404t:684_11: bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā vuttā. Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:689_0: 71-74. Tatiyassa paṭhame sīlassa anavasesasamādānena akhaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā ca paripuṇṇasīlā.
tika-s0404t:689_1: Samādānato paṭṭhāya avicchindanato sīlasamaṅgino. Ettāvatā kirāti kira-saddo arucisūcanattho.
tika-s0404t:689_2: Tenettha ācariyavādassa attano aruccanabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Sampannasīlāti anāmaṭṭhavisesaṃ
tika-s0404t:689_3: sāmaññato sīlasaṅkhepena gahitaṃ. Tañca catubbidhanti ācariyatthero “catupārisuddhisīlaṃ
tika-s0404t:689_4: uddisitvā”ti āha. Tatthāti catupārisuddhisīle. Jeṭṭhakasīlanti padhānasīlaṃ. Ubhayatthāti
tika-s0404t:689_5: uddesaniddese. Idha niddese viya uddesepi pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā vutto “sampannasīlā”ti
tika-s0404t:689_6: vuttattāti adhippāyo. Sīlaggahaṇañhi pāḷiyaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaravasena āgataṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0404t:689_7: “pātimokkhasaṃvaroyevā”tiādi. Tattha avadhāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhataṃ
tika-s0404t:689_8: dīpeti. Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu chasikkhāpadavītikkame gilānapaccayassa
tika-s0404t:689_9: apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca āpatti vihitāti. Tīṇīti indriyasaṃvarasīlādīni. Sīlanti
tika-s0404t:689_10: vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
tika-s0404t:689_11: kiṃ atthi yathā pātimokkhasaṃvaroti ācariyassa sammukhattā appaṭikkhipantova upacārena
tika-s0404t:689_12: pucchanto viya vadati. Tenāha “ananujānanto”ti. Chadvārarakkhāmattakamevāti tassa
tika-s0404t:689_14: nayo. Paccayuppattimattakanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti. Uppādanahetukā hi paccayānaṃ
tika-s0404t:689_15: uppatti. Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:689_16: Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa parivāravasena pavattiyā
tika-s0404t:690_0: Idāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ
tika-s0404t:690_1: “yassā”tiādimāha. Tattha soti pātimokkhasaṃvaro. Sesānīti indriyasaṃvarādīni. Tasse
tika-s0404t:690_2: vāti “sampannasīlā”ti ettha yaṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ, tasseva. Sampannapātimokkhāti ettha
tika-s0404t:690_3: pātimokkhaggahaṇena vevacanaṃ vatvā taṃ vitthāretvā…pe… ādimāha. Yathā aññatthāpi
tika-s0404t:690_4: “idha bhikkhu sīlavā hotī”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya uddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto
tika-s0404t:690_5: viharatī”ti niddiṭṭhaṃ. Kasmā āraddhanti desanāya kāraṇapucchā. Sīlānisaṃsadassanatthanti
tika-s0404t:690_6: payojananiddeso. “Sīlānisaṃsadassanattha”nti hi ettha byatirekato yaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa
tika-s0404t:690_7: adassanaṃ, taṃ imissā desanāya kāraṇanti kasmā āraddhanti? Veneyyānaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa
