tika-s0404t:690_8: adassanatoti atthato āpanno eva hoti. Tenāha “sacepī”tiādi. Sīlānisaṃsadassanatthanti
tika-s0404t:690_9: pana imassa atthaṃ vivarituṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ānisaṃsoti udayo. “Sīlavā sīlasampanno
tika-s0404t:690_10: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī”tiādīsu pana vipākaphalampi
tika-s0404t:690_11: “ānisaṃso”ti vuttaṃ. Ko visesoti ko phalaviseso. Kā vaḍḍhīti ko abbhudayo. Vijjamānopi
tika-s0404t:690_12: guṇo yāthāvato vibhāvito eva abhiruciṃ uppādeti, na avibhāvito, tasmā ekantato ānisaṃsakittanaṃ
tika-s0404t:691_0: Piyoti piyāyitabbo. Piyassa nāma dassanaṃ ekantato abhinanditabbaṃ hotīti āha “piyacakkhūhi
tika-s0404t:691_2: vuccati. Tesanti sabrahmacārīnaṃ. Manavaḍḍhanakoti pītimanassa paribrūhanato uparūpari
tika-s0404t:691_3: pīticittasseva uppādanako. Garuṭṭhāniyoti garukaraṇassa ṭhānabhūto. Jānaṃ jānātīti
tika-s0404t:691_4: ñāṇena jānitabbaṃ jānāti. Yathā vā aññe ajānantāpi jānantā viya pavattanti, na evamayaṃ,
tika-s0404t:691_5: ayaṃ pana jānanto eva jānāti. Passaṃ passatīti dassanabhūtena paññācakkhunā passitabbaṃ
tika-s0404t:691_6: passati, passanto eva vā passati. Evaṃ sambhāvanīyoti evaṃ viññutāya paṇḍitabhāvena
tika-s0404t:691_7: sambhāvetabbo. Sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti sīlesu paripūrakārī eva bhaveyyāti. Evaṃ
tika-s0404t:691_8: uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañhi iminā padena uparisikkhādvayaṃ anivattitameva
tika-s0404t:691_9: hoti. Yathā pana sīlesu paripūrakārī nāma hoti, taṃ phalena dassetuṃ “ajjhatta”ntiādi
tika-s0404t:691_10: vuttaṃ. Vipassanādhiṭṭhānasamādhisaṃvattanikatāya hi idha sīlassa pāripūrī, na kevalaṃ
tika-s0404t:691_11: akhaṇḍādibhāvamattaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “yāni kho pana tāni akhaṇḍāni…pe… samādhisaṃvattanikānī”ti.
tika-s0404t:691_12: Evañca katvā uparisikkhādvayaṃ sīlassa sambhārabhāvena gahitanti sīlassevettha padhānaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0404t:691_13: siddhaṃ hoti. Sīlānurakkhakā hi cittekaggatāsaṅkhārapariggahā. Anūnenāti akhaṇḍādibhāvena,
tika-s0404t:691_14: kassaci vā ahāpanena upapannena. Ākārenāti karaṇena sampādanena.
tika-s0404t:692_0: Ajjhattanti vā attanoti vā ekaṃ ekatthaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Bhummatthe cetaṃ, “samatha”nti
tika-s0404t:692_1: upayogavacanaṃ “anū”ti iminā upasaggena yoge siddhanti āha “attano cittasamathe yutto”ti.
tika-s0404t:692_2: Tattha cittasamatheti cittassa samādhāne. Yuttoti aviyutto pasuto. Yo sabbena sabbaṃ
tika-s0404t:692_3: jhānabhāvanāya ananuyutto, so taṃ bahi nīharati nāma. Yo ārabhitvā antarā saṅkocaṃ
tika-s0404t:692_4: āpajjati, so taṃ vināseti nāma. Yo pana īdiso ahutvā jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
tika-s0404t:692_6: idaṃ nirākaraṇaṃ nāma. “Thambhaṃ niraṃkatvā nivātavuttī”tiādīsu cassa payogo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:693_0: Sattavidhāya anupassanāyāti ettha aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā,
tika-s0404t:693_2: sattavidhā anupassanā. Suññāgāragato bhikkhu tattha laddhakāyavivekatāya samathavipassanāvasena
tika-s0404t:693_3: cittavivekaṃ paribrūhento yathānusiṭṭhapaṭipattiyā lokaṃ sāsanañca attano visesādhigamaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
tika-s0404t:693_4: suññāgārañca upasobhayamāno guṇavisesādhiṭṭhānabhāvāpādanena viññūnaṃ atthato taṃ
tika-s0404t:693_5: brūhento nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti. Tenāha “ettha cā”tiādi. Ekabhūmakādipāsāde
tika-s0404t:693_6: kurumānopi pana neva suññāgārānaṃ brūhetāti daṭṭhabbo. Suññāgāraggahaṇena cettha
tika-s0404t:693_7: araññarukkhamūlādi sabbaṃ padhānānuyogakkhamaṃ senāsanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:694_0: Ettāvatā yathā taṇhāvicaritadesanā paṭhamaṃ taṇhāvasena āraddhāpi taṇhāpadaṭṭhānattā
tika-s0404t:694_1: mānadiṭṭhīnaṃ mānadiṭṭhiyo osaritvā kamena papañcattayadesanā jātā, evamayaṃ desanā
tika-s0404t:694_2: paṭhamaṃ adhisīlasikkhāvasena āraddhāpi sīlapadaṭṭhānattā samathavipassanānaṃ samathavipassanāyo
tika-s0404t:694_3: osaritvā kamena sikkhāttayadesanā jātāti veditabbā. Ettha hi “sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti
tika-s0404t:694_6: suññāgārāna”nti iminā pana samathavasena suññāgāravaḍḍhane adhicittasikkhā, vipassanāvasena
tika-s0404t:694_7: adhipaññāsikkhāti evaṃ dvepi sikkhā saṅgahetvā vuttā. Ettha ca “ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyutto
tika-s0404t:694_8: anirākatajjhāno”ti imehi padehi sīlānurakkhikā eva cittekaggatā kathitā, “vipassanāyā”ti
tika-s0404t:695_0: Kathaṃ cittekaggatā sīlamanurakkhati? Yassa hi cittekaggatā natthi, so byādhimhi
tika-s0404t:695_1: uppanne vihaññati, so byādhivihato vikkhittacitto sīlaṃ vināsetvāpi byādhivūpasamaṃ
tika-s0404t:695_2: kattā hoti. Yassa pana cittekaggatā atthi, so taṃ byādhidukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā samāpattiṃ
tika-s0404t:695_3: samāpajjati, samāpannakkhaṇe dukkhaṃ dūragataṃ hoti, balavataraṃ sukhamuppajjati.
tika-s0404t:695_4: Evaṃ cittekaggatā sīlamanurakkhati. Kathaṃ saṅkhārapariggaho sīlamanurakkhati? Yassa
tika-s0404t:695_5: hi saṅkhārapariggaho natthi, tassa “mama rūpaṃ mama viññāṇa”nti attabhāve balavamamattaṃ
tika-s0404t:695_6: hoti, so tathārūpesu dubbhikkhabyādhibhayādīsu sampattesu sīlaṃ nāsetvāpi attabhāvaṃ
tika-s0404t:695_7: posetā hoti. Yassa pana saṅkhārapariggaho atthi, tassa attabhāve balavamamattaṃ vā
tika-s0404t:695_8: sineho vā na hoti, so tathārūpesu dubbhikkhabyādhibhayādīsu sampattesu sacepissa
tika-s0404t:695_9: antāni bahi nikkhamanti, sacepi ussussati visussati, khaṇḍākhaṇḍiko vā hoti satadhāpi
tika-s0404t:695_10: sahassadhāpi, neva sīlaṃ vināsetvā attabhāvaṃ posetā hoti. Evaṃ saṅkhārapariggaho sīlaṃ anurakkhati.
tika-s0404t:696_0: “Brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti iminā pana tasseva ubhayassa brūhanā vaḍḍhanā sātaccakiriyā
tika-s0404t:696_1: dassitā. Evaṃ bhagavā yasmā “sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo cassaṃ…pe… bhāvanīyo cā”ti ime
tika-s0404t:696_2: cattāro dhamme ākaṅkhantena natthaññaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ, aññadatthu sīlādiguṇasamannāgateneva
tika-s0404t:696_3: bhavitabbaṃ. Īdiso hi sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo. Vuttampi hetaṃ –
tika-s0404t:698: Attano kamma kubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piya”nti. ;
tika-s0404t:699_0: Tasmā “ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo cassaṃ…pe… sīlesvevassa
tika-s0404t:699_1: paripūrakārī…pe… suññāgārāna”nti vatvā idāni yasmā paccayalābhādiṃ patthayantenapi
tika-s0404t:699_2: idameva karaṇīyaṃ, na aññaṃ kiñci, tasmā “ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu lābhī
tika-s0404t:699_3: assa”ntiādimāha. Lābhī assanti lābhāsāya saṃvarasīlaparipūraṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ. Kimīdisaṃ
tika-s0404t:699_4: bhagavā anujānātīti? Na bhagavā sabhāvena īdisaṃ anujānāti, mahākāruṇikatāya pana
tika-s0404t:699_5: puggalajjhāsayena evaṃ vuttanti dassento “na bhagavā”tiādimāha. Tattha ghāsesanaṃ
tika-s0404t:699_6: chinnakatho, na vācaṃ payuttaṃ bhaṇeti chinnakatho mūgo viya hutvā obhāsaparikathānimittaviññattipayuttaṃ
tika-s0404t:699_7: ghāsesanaṃ vācaṃ na bhaṇe, na katheyyāti attho. Puggalajjhāsayavasenāti saṅkhepato
tika-s0404t:699_8: vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “yesaṃ hī”tiādimāha. Raso sabhāvabhūto ānisaṃso rasānisaṃso.
tika-s0404t:700_1: ubhayametaṃ atthato ekaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ. “Pañcime, gahapatayo, ānisaṃsā”tiādīsu
tika-s0404t:700_2: hi ānisaṃsasaddo phalapariyāyopi hoti. Mahantaṃ vā lokiyasukhaṃ phalanti pasavantīti
tika-s0404t:700_3: mahapphalā, mahato lokuttarasukhassa paccayā hontīti mahānisaṃsā. Tenāha “lokiyasukhena phalabhūtenā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:701_0: Peccabhavaṃ gatāti petūpapattivasena nibbattiṃ upagatā. Te pana yasmā idha katakālakiriyā
tika-s0404t:701_1: kālena katajīvitupacchedā honti, tasmā vuttaṃ “kālakatā”ti. Sassusasurā ca tappakkhikā
tika-s0404t:701_2: ca sassusasurapakkhikā. Te ñātiyonisambandhena āvāhavivāhasambandhavasena sambaddhā
tika-s0404t:701_3: ñātī. Sālohitāti yonisambandhavasena. Ekalohitabaddhāti ekena samānena lohitasambandhena
tika-s0404t:701_4: sambaddhā. Pasannacittoti pasannacittako. Kālakato pitā vā mātā vā petayoniyaṃ uppannoti
tika-s0404t:701_5: adhikārato viññāyatīti vuttaṃ. Mahānisaṃsameva hotīti tassa tathāsīlasampannattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:702_0: Ajjhottharitāti madditā. Na ca maṃ arati saheyyāti maṃ ca arati na abhibhaveyya na
tika-s0404t:702_1: maddeyya na ajjhotthareyya. Uppannanti jātaṃ nibbattaṃ. Sīlādiguṇayutto hi aratiñca
tika-s0404t:702_2: ratiñca sahati ajjhottharati, madditvā tiṭṭhati, tasmā īdisamattānaṃ icchantenapi
tika-s0404t:702_3: sīlādiguṇayutteneva bhavitabbanti dasseti. Cittutrāso bhāyatīti bhayaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0404t:702_4: bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ. Taṃ duvidhampi bhayaṃ bheravañca sahati abhibhavatīti bhayabheravasaho.
tika-s0404t:702_5: Sīlādiguṇayutto hi bhayabheravaṃ sahati ajjhottharati, madditvā tiṭṭhati ariyakoṭiyavāsī
tika-s0404t:703_0: Thero kira maggaṃ paṭipanno aññataraṃ pāsādikaṃ araññaṃ disvā “idhevajja samaṇadhammaṃ
tika-s0404t:703_1: katvā gamissāmī”ti maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā pallaṅkaṃ
tika-s0404t:703_2: ābhujitvā nisīdi. Rukkhadevatāya dārakā therassa sīlatejena sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ
tika-s0404t:703_3: asakkontā vissaramakaṃsu. Devatāpi sakalarukkhaṃ cālesi. Thero acalova nisīdi. Sā
tika-s0404t:703_4: devatā dhūmāyi pajjali. Neva sakkhi theraṃ cāletuṃ. Tato upāsakavaṇṇenāgantvā vanditvā
tika-s0404t:703_5: aṭṭhāsi. “Ko eso”ti vuttā “ahaṃ, bhante, tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā”ti avoca.
tika-s0404t:703_6: Tvaṃ ete vikāre akāsīti. Āma, bhanteti. “Kasmā”ti ca vuttā āha “tumhākaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0404t:703_7: sīlatejena dārakā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vissaramakaṃsu, sāhaṃ tumhe palāpetuṃ
tika-s0404t:703_8: evamakāsi”nti. Thero āha “atha kasmā ‘idha, bhante, mā vasatha, mayhaṃ aphāsuka’nti
tika-s0404t:703_9: paṭikacceva nāvacāsi, idāni pana mā maṃ kiñci avaca, ‘ariyakoṭiyamahādatto amanussabhayena
tika-s0404t:703_10: gato’ti vacanato lajjāmi, tenāhaṃ idheva vasissaṃ, tvaṃ pana ajjekadivasaṃ yattha
tika-s0404t:703_11: katthaci vasāhī”ti. Evaṃ sīlādiguṇayutto bhayabheravasaho hoti, tasmā īdisamattānaṃ
tika-s0404t:703_12: icchantenapi sīlādiguṇayutteneva bhavitabbanti dasseti. Dutiyādīni uttānatthāni.
tika-s0404t:706_0: 75-80. Pañcame imassa hi puggalassa sīlavirahitassa paññā sīlaṃ paridhovatīti akhaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena
tika-s0404t:706_1: sīlaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānesu paññāya suvisodhitaṃ karoti. Yassa hi abbhantare sīlasaṃvaro
tika-s0404t:706_2: natthi, ugghaṭitaññutāya pana cātuppadikagāthāpariyosāne paññāya sīlaṃ dhovitvā saha
tika-s0404t:706_3: paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ paññāya sīlaṃ dhovati nāma seyyathāpi santatimahāmatto.
tika-s0404t:707_0: Sīlavā pana paññaṃ dhovati. Yassa hi puthujjanassa sīlaṃ saṭṭhiasītivassāni akhaṇḍaṃ
tika-s0404t:707_1: hoti, so maraṇakālepi sabbakilese ghātetvā sīlena paññaṃ dhovitvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti
tika-s0404t:707_2: kandarasālapariveṇe mahāsaṭṭhivassatthero viya. There kira maraṇamañce nipajjitvā
tika-s0404t:707_3: balavavedanāya nitthunante tissamahārājā “theraṃ passissāmī”ti gantvā pariveṇadvāre
tika-s0404t:707_4: ṭhito taṃ saddaṃ sutvā pucchi “kassa saddo aya”nti. Therassa nitthunanasaddoti. “Pabbajjāya
tika-s0404t:707_5: saṭṭhivassena vedanāpariggahamattampi na kataṃ, idāni na taṃ vandissāmī”ti nivattitvā
tika-s0404t:707_6: mahābodhiṃ vandituṃ gato. Tato upaṭṭhākadaharo theraṃ āha “kiṃ no, bhante, lajjāpetha,
tika-s0404t:707_7: saddhopi rājā vippaṭisārī hutvā ‘na vandissāmī’ti gato”ti. Kasmā, āvusoti? Tumhākaṃ
tika-s0404t:707_8: nitthunanasaddaṃ sutvāti. “Tena hi me okāsaṃ karothā”ti vatvā vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā
tika-s0404t:707_9: arahattaṃ patvā daharassa saññaṃ adāsi “gacchāvuso, idāni rājānaṃ amhe vandāpehī”ti.
tika-s0404t:707_10: Daharo gantvā “idāni kira theraṃ vandathā”ti āha. Rājā susumārapatitena theraṃ vandanto
tika-s0404t:707_11: “nāhaṃ ayyassa arahattaṃ vandāmi, puthujjanabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhatvā rakkhitasīlameva
tika-s0404t:707_12: vandāmī”ti āha. Evaṃ sīlena paññaṃ dhovati nāma. Sesaṃ vuttameva. Chaṭṭhādīsu natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:712_0: 81-88. Catutthassa paṭhame vimariyādīkatenāti nimmariyādīkatena. Cetasāti evaṃvidhena
tika-s0404t:712_1: cittena viharati. Tattha dve mariyādā kilesamariyādā ca ārammaṇamariyādā ca. Sace
tika-s0404t:712_2: hissa rūpādike ārabbha rāgādayo uppajjeyyuṃ, kilesamariyādā tena katā bhaveyya. Tesu
tika-s0404t:712_3: panassa ekopi na uppannoti kilesamariyādā natthi. Sace panassa rūpādidhamme āvajjentassa
tika-s0404t:712_4: ekacce āpāthaṃ nāgaccheyyuṃ, evamassa ārammaṇamariyādā bhaveyya. Te panassa dhamme
tika-s0404t:712_5: āvajjentassa āpāthaṃ anāgatadhammo nāma natthīti ārammaṇamariyādāpi natthi. Idha
tika-s0404t:712_6: pana kilesamariyādā adhippetāti āha “kilesamariyādaṃ bhinditvā”tiādi. Tatiyādīsu natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:715_0: 89-90. Navame kokālikanāmakā dve bhikkhū. Tato idhādhippetaṃ niddhāretvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t:715_1: “koyaṃ kokāliko”ti pucchā. Suttassa aṭṭhuppattiṃ dassetuṃ “kasmā ca upasaṅkamī”ti
tika-s0404t:715_2: pucchā. Ayaṃ kirātiādi yathākkamaṃ tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Vivekavāsaṃ vasitukāmattā appicchatāya
tika-s0404t:715_3: ca mā no kassaci…pe… vasiṃsu. Āghātaṃ uppādesi attano icchāvighātanato. Therā bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-s0404t:715_4: niyyādayiṃsu payuttavācāya akatattā therehi ca adāpitattā. Pubbepi…pe… maññeti iminā
tika-s0404t:715_5: therānaṃ kohaññe ṭhitabhāvaṃ āsaṅkati avaṇe vaṇaṃ passanto viya, suparisuddhe ādāsatale
tika-s0404t:716_0: Aparajjhitvāti bhagavato sammukhā “pāpabhikkhū jātā”ti vatvā. Mahāsāvajjadassanatthanti
tika-s0404t:716_1: mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Māhevanti mā evamāha, mā evaṃ bhaṇi.
tika-s0404t:716_2: Saddhāya ayo uppādo saddhāyo, taṃ āvahatīti saddhāyikoti āha “saddhāya āgamakaro”ti.
tika-s0404t:716_3: Saddhāyikoti vā saddhāya ayitabbo, saddheyyoti attho. Tenāha “saddhātabbavacano vā”ti.
tika-s0404t:717_0: Pīḷakā nāma bāhirato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhīni bhindanti, imā pana paṭhamaṃyeva aṭṭhīni bhinditvā
tika-s0404t:717_1: uggatā. Tenāha “aṭṭhīni bhinditvā uggatāhi piḷakāhī”ti. Taruṇabeluvamattiyoti taruṇabillaphalamattiyo.
tika-s0404t:717_2: Visagilitoti khittapaharaṇo. Tañca baḷisaṃ visasamaññā loke. Ārakkhadevatānaṃ saddaṃ
tika-s0404t:718_0: Brahmaloketi suddhāvāsaloke. Varākoti anuggahavacanametaṃ. Hīnapariyāyoti keci. Piyasīlāti
tika-s0404t:718_1: iminā etasmiṃ atthe niruttinayena pesalāti padasiddhīti dasseti. Kabarakkhīnīti byādhibalena
tika-s0404t:718_2: paribhinnavaṇṇatāya kabarabhūtāni akkhīni. Yattakanti bhagavato vacanaṃ aññathā karontena
tika-s0404t:718_3: yattakaṃ tayā aparaddhaṃ, tassa pamāṇaṃ natthīti attho. Yasmā anāgāmino nāma pahīnakāmacchandabyāpādā
tika-s0404t:718_4: honti, tvañca diṭṭhikāmacchandabyāpādavasena idhāgato, tasmā yāvañca te idaṃ aparaddhanti
tika-s0404t:719_0: Adiṭṭhippattoti appattadiṭṭhiko. Gilitaviso viya visaṃ gilitvā ṭhito viya. Kuṭhārisadisā
tika-s0404t:719_1: mūlapacchindanaṭṭhena. Uttamattheti arahatte. Khīṇāsavoti vadati sunakkhatto viya
tika-s0404t:719_2: acelaṃ korakkhattiyaṃ. Yo aggasāvako viya pasaṃsitabbo khīṇāsavo, taṃ “dussīlo aya”nti
tika-s0404t:719_3: vadati. Vicinātīti ācinoti pasavati. Pasaṃsiyanindā tāva sampannaguṇaparidhaṃsanavasena
tika-s0404t:719_4: pavattiyā sāvajjatāya kaṭukavipākā, nindiyappasaṃsā pana kathaṃ tāya samavipākāti?
tika-s0404t:719_5: Tattha avijjamānaguṇasamāropanena attano paresañca micchāpaṭipattihetubhāvato pasaṃsiyena
tika-s0404t:719_6: tassa samabhāvakaraṇato ca. Lokepi hi asūraṃ sūrena samaṃ karonto gārayho hoti, pageva
tika-s0404t:720: Sakena dhanenāti attano sāpateyyena. Ayaṃ appamattako aparādho diṭṭhadhammikattā sappatikārattā ca tassa. Ayaṃ mahantataro kali katūpacitassa samparāyikattā appatikārattā ca.
tika-s0404t:721_0: Nirabbudoti gaṇanāviseso esoti āha “nirabbudagaṇanāyā”ti, satasahassaṃ nirabbudānanti
tika-s0404t:721_1: attho. Yamariyagarahī nirayaṃ upetīti ettha yathāvuttaāyuppamāṇaṃ pākatikavasena
tika-s0404t:721_2: ariyūpavādinā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Aggasāvakānaṃ pana guṇamahantatāya tatopi ativiya
tika-s0404t:722_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampatīti ko ayaṃ brahmā, kasmā ca pana bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-s0404t:722_1: etadavocāti? Ayaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma bhikkhu anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāsesu
tika-s0404t:722_2: uppanno, tattha sahampati brahmāti sañjānanti. So panāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-s0404t:722_3: “padumanirayaṃ kittessāmi, tato bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocessati, athānusandhikusalā
tika-s0404t:722_4: bhikkhū tatthāyuppamāṇaṃ pucchissanti, bhagavā ācikkhanto ariyūpavāde ādīnavaṃ pakāsessatī”ti
tika-s0404t:723_0: Magadharaṭṭhe saṃvohārato māgadhako pattho, tena. Paccitabbaṭṭhānassāti nirayadukkhena
tika-s0404t:723_1: paccitabbappadesassa etaṃ abbudoti nāmaṃ. Vassagaṇanāti ekato paṭṭhāya dasaguṇitaṃ
tika-s0404t:723_2: abbudaāyumhi tato aparaṃ vīsatiguṇitaṃ nirabbudādīsu vassagaṇanā veditabbā. Ayañca
tika-s0404t:723_3: gaṇanā aparicitānaṃ dukkarāti vuttaṃ “na taṃ sukaraṃ saṅkhātu”nti. Keci pana “tattha
tika-s0404t:723_4: tattha paridevanānattena kammakāraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0404t:723_5: apare “sītanarakā ete”ti. Sabbatthāti ababādīsu padumapariyosānesu sabbesu nirayesu.
tika-s0404t:723_6: Esa nayoti heṭṭhimato uparimassa vīsatiguṇataṃ atidisati. Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:728_0: 91-94. Pañcamassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Catutthe tapanaṃ santapanaṃ kāyassa khedanaṃ
tika-s0404t:728_1: tapo, so etassa atthīti tapassī, taṃ tapassiṃ. Yasmā tathābhūto tapanissito, tapo
tika-s0404t:728_2: vā tannissito, tasmā āha “tapanissitaka”nti. Lūkhaṃ pharusaṃ sādhusammatācāravirahato
tika-s0404t:728_3: na pasādanīyaṃ ājīvati vattatīti lūkhājīvī, taṃ lūkhājīviṃ. Upakkosatīti uppaṇḍeti,
tika-s0404t:728_4: upahasanavasena paribhāsati. Upavadatīti avaññāpubbakaṃ apavadati. Tenāha “hīḷeti vambhetī”ti.
tika-s0404t:731_0: 95. Pañcame paccante bhavaṃ paccantimaṃ. Pākārassa thirabhāvaṃ uddhamuddhaṃ pāpetīti
tika-s0404t:731_1: uddhāpaṃ, pākāramūlaṃ. Ādi-saddena pākāradvārabandhaparikhādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:731_2: Paṇḍitadovārikaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā bhagavā attānaṃ dassesīti dassento “ekadvāranti kasmā
tika-s0404t:731_3: āhā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Yassā paññāya vasena puriso paṇḍitoti vuccati, taṃ paṇḍiccanti
tika-s0404t:731_4: āha “paṇḍiccena samannāgato”ti. Taṃtaṃitikattabbatāsu chekabhāvo byattabhāvo veyyattiyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:731_5: Medhati sammohaṃ hiṃsati vidhamatīti medhā, sā etassa atthīti medhāvī. Ṭhāne ṭhāne
tika-s0404t:731_6: uppatti etissā atthīti ṭhānuppattikā, ṭhānaso uppajjanapaññā. Anupariyāyanti etenāti
tika-s0404t:731_7: anupariyāyo, so eva pathoti anupariyāyapatho, parito pākārassa anusaṃyāyanamaggo.
tika-s0404t:731_8: Pākārabhāgā sandhātabbā etthāti pākārasandhi, pākārassa phullitappadeso. So pana
tika-s0404t:731_9: heṭṭhimantena dvinnampi iṭṭhakānaṃ vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha “dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ
tika-s0404t:731_10: apagataṭṭhāna”nti. Chinnaṭṭhānanti chinnabhinnappadeso, chiddaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Tañhi vivaranti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:734_0: 96-98. Chaṭṭhe khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇaṭṭhena “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0404t:734_1: Avijjāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ upanissayādibhāvena pavattanato. Yathāha “assutavā, bhikkhave,
tika-s0404t:734_2: puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido”tiādi. Phassopi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:734_3: Yathā cāha “tadapi phassapaccayā phussa phussa paṭisaṃvediyantī”ti ca. Saññāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:734_4: Vuttañhetaṃ “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā, pathavito saññatvā”ti ca ādi. Vitakkopi
tika-s0404t:734_5: diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ “takkañca diṭṭhīsu pakappayitvā, saccaṃ musāti dvayadhammamāhū”ti,
tika-s0404t:734_6: “takkī hoti vīmaṃsī”ti ca ādi. Ayonisomanasikāropi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā
tika-s0404t:734_7: – “tassevaṃ ayoniso manasikaroto channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati, atthi
tika-s0404t:734_8: me attāti tassa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjatī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:735_0: Yā diṭṭhīti idāni vuccamānānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ padānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ mūlapadaṃ. Diṭṭhiyeva
tika-s0404t:735_1: diṭṭhigataṃ gūthagataṃ viya, diṭṭhīsu vā gataṃ idaṃ dassanaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhīsu antogadhattātipi
tika-s0404t:735_2: diṭṭhigataṃ, diṭṭhiyā vā gataṃ diṭṭhigataṃ. Idañhi “atthi me attā”tiādi diṭṭhiyā
tika-s0404t:735_3: gamanamattameva, natthettha attā vā nicco vā kocīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sā cāyaṃ diṭṭhi
tika-s0404t:735_4: dunniggamanaṭṭhena gahanaṃ. Duratikkamaṭṭhena sappaṭibhayaṭṭhena ca kantāro dubbhikkhakantāravāḷakantārādayo
tika-s0404t:735_5: viya. Sammādiṭṭhiyā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena, vilomanaṭṭhena vā visūkaṃ. Kadāci sassatassa,
tika-s0404t:735_6: kadāci ucchedassa vā gahaṇato virūpaṃ phanditanti vipphanditaṃ. Bandhanaṭṭhena saṃyojanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:735_7: Diṭṭhiyeva anto tudanaṭṭhena dunnīharaṇīyaṭṭhena ca sallanti diṭṭhisallaṃ. Diṭṭhiyeva
tika-s0404t:735_8: pīḷākaraṇaṭṭhena sambādhoti diṭṭhisambādho. Diṭṭhiyeva mokkhāvaraṇaṭṭhena palibodhoti
tika-s0404t:735_9: diṭṭhipalibodho. Diṭṭhiyeva dummocanīyaṭṭhena bandhananti diṭṭhibandhanaṃ. Diṭṭhiyeva
tika-s0404t:735_10: duruttaraṇaṭṭhena papātoti diṭṭhipapāto. Diṭṭhiyeva thāmagataṭṭhena anusayoti diṭṭhānusayo.
tika-s0404t:735_11: Diṭṭhiyeva attānaṃ santāpetīti diṭṭhisantāpo. Diṭṭhiyeva attānaṃ anudahatīti diṭṭhipariḷāho.
tika-s0404t:735_12: Diṭṭhiyeva kilesakāyaṃ ganthetīti diṭṭhigantho. Diṭṭhiyeva bhusaṃ ādiyatīti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:735_14: āmasati, parato vā āmasatīti diṭṭhiparāmāso, samuṭṭhāti etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:735_15: Samuṭṭhānassa bhāvo samuṭṭhānaṭṭho, tena samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena, kāraṇabhāvenāti attho.
tika-s0404t:738_0: 99-100. Navame ajjhogāhetvā adhippetamatthaṃ sambhavituṃ sādhetuṃ dukkhāni durabhisambhavāni.
tika-s0404t:738_1: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tattha nivāsoyeva dukkhoti dassetuṃ “sambhavituṃ dukkhāni dussahānī”ti
tika-s0404t:738_3: hi saṇḍabhūte rukkhasamūhepi vattatīti araññaggahaṇaṃ. Pavivekanti pakārato, pakārehi
tika-s0404t:738_4: vā vivecanaṃ, rūpādiputhuttārammaṇe pakārato gamanādiiriyāpathappakārehi attano kāyassa
tika-s0404t:738_5: vivecanaṃ, gacchatopi tiṭṭhatopi nisajjatopi nipajjatopi ekasseva pavatti. Teneva
tika-s0404t:738_6: hi vivecetabbānaṃ vivecanākārassa ca bhedato bahuvidhattā te ekattena gahetvā “paviveka”nti
tika-s0404t:738_7: ekavacanena vuttaṃ. Dukkaraṃ pavivekanti vā pavivekaṃ kattuṃ na sukhanti attho. Ekībhāveti
tika-s0404t:738_8: ekattabhāve. Dvayaṃdvayārāmoti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ bhāvābhirato. Haranti viyāti saṃharanti
tika-s0404t:738_9: viya vighātuppādanena. Tenāha “ghasanti viyā”ti. Bhayasantāsuppādanena khādituṃ āgatā
tika-s0404t:738_10: yakkharakkhasapisācādayo viyāti adhippāyo. Īdisassāti aladdhasamādhino. Tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehīti
tika-s0404t:738_11: vāteritānaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādīnaṃ migapakkhiādīnañca bhīsanakehi bheravehi saddehi. Vividhehi
tika-s0404t:738_12: ca aññehi khāṇuādīhi yakkhādiākārehi upaṭṭhitehi bhīsanakehi. Ghaṭena kīḷā ghaṭikāti
tika-s0404t:745_0: 101-112. Tatiyassa paṭhamādīni uttānāni. Chaṭṭhe nijjarakāraṇānīti pajahanakāraṇāni.
tika-s0404t:745_1: Imasmiṃ maggo kathīyatīti katvā “ayaṃ heṭṭhā…pe… puna gahitā”ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi nijjiṇṇā
tika-s0404t:745_2: micchādiṭṭhīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Yathā micchādiṭṭhi vipassanāya nijjiṇṇāpi
tika-s0404t:745_3: na samucchinnāti samucchedappahānadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā, evaṃ micchāsaṅkappādayopi
tika-s0404t:745_4: vipassanāya pahīnāpi asamucchinnatāya idha puna gahitāti ayamattho “micchāsaṅkappassā”tiādīsu
tika-s0404t:745_5: sabbapadesu vattabboti dasseti “evaṃ sabbapadesu yojetabbo”ti iminā. Ettha cāti “sammāvimuttipaccayā
tika-s0404t:745_6: ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”ti etasmiṃ pāḷipade. Ettha ca samucchedavasena
tika-s0404t:745_7: ca paṭippassaddhivasena ca paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ sammadeva vimuccanaṃ sammāvimutti.
tika-s0404t:745_8: Tappaccayā ca maggaphalesu aṭṭha indriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṃ upagacchantīti maggasampayuttānipi
tika-s0404t:745_9: saddhādīni indriyāni uddhaṭāni. Maggavasena hi phalesu bhāvanāpāripūrī nāmāti. Abhinandanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0404t:745_10: ativiya sinehanaṭṭhena. Idañhi somanassindriyaṃ ukkaṃsagatasātasabhāvato sampayuttadhamme
tika-s0404t:745_11: sinehantaṃ tementaṃ viya pavattati. Pavattasantatiādhipateyyaṭṭhenāti vipākasantānassa
tika-s0404t:745_12: jīvane adhipatibhāvena. Evantiādi vuttasseva atthassa nigamanaṃ. Sattamādīni uttānatthāni.
tika-s0404t:750_0: 113-6. Dutiyassa paṭhamadutiyāni uttānatthāni. Tatiye jānaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇena
tika-s0404t:750_1: jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti eva. Na hi padesañāṇe ṭhito jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena
tika-s0404t:750_2: hi avisesaggahaṇena ca “jāna”nti iminā niravasesaṃ ñeyyajātaṃ pariggayhatīti tabbisayāya
tika-s0404t:750_3: jānanakiriyāya sabbaññutaññāṇameva karaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ, pakaraṇavasena “bhagavā”ti
tika-s0404t:750_4: saddantarasannidhānena ca ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. Passitabbameva passatīti dibbacakkhupaññācakkhudhammacakkhubuddhacakkhusamantacakkhusaṅkhātehi
tika-s0404t:750_5: ñāṇacakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passati eva. Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti yathā aññe savipallāsā
tika-s0404t:750_6: kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti, na evaṃ bhagavā. Bhagavā
tika-s0404t:750_7: pana pahīnavipallāsattā jānanto jānāti eva, diṭṭhidassanassa abhāvā passanto passatiyevāti
tika-s0404t:750_8: attho. Cakkhu viya bhūtoti dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhu viya bhūto. Yathā hi cakkhu
tika-s0404t:750_9: sattānaṃ dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti sādheti, evaṃ lokassa yāthāvadassanasādhanatopi dassanakiccapariṇāyakaṭṭhena
tika-s0404t:750_10: cakkhu viya bhūto, paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhuñāṇena paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti vā cakkhubhūto.
tika-s0404t:751_1: vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti dhammabhūto. Tenāha “dhammasabhāvo”ti.
tika-s0404t:751_2: Dhammā vā bodhipakkhiyā tehi uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato, anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0404t:751_3: vā dhammaṃ patto adhigatoti dhammabhūto. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtoti āha “seṭṭhasabhāvo”ti.
tika-s0404t:751_4: Atha vā brahmā vuccati maggo, tena uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato, tañca sayambhuñāṇena
tika-s0404t:751_5: pattoti brahmabhūto. Catusaccadhammaṃ vadatīti vattā. Ciraṃ saccappaṭivedhaṃ pavattento
tika-s0404t:751_6: vadatīti pavattā. Atthaṃ nīharitvāti dukkhādiatthaṃ tatthāpi pīḷanādiatthaṃ uddharitvā.
tika-s0404t:751_7: Paramatthaṃ vā nibbānaṃ pāpayitā ninnetā. Amatādhigamapaṭipattidesanāya amatasacchikiriyaṃ
tika-s0404t:751_8: sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti amatassa dātā. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tadāyattabhāvato
tika-s0404t:754_0: 117-154. Pañcame appakāti thokā, na bahū. Athāyaṃ itarā pajāti yā panāyaṃ avasesā
tika-s0404t:754_1: pajā sakkāyadiṭṭhitīrameva anudhāvati, ayameva bahutarāti attho. Sammadakkhāteti
tika-s0404t:754_2: sammā akkhāte sukathite. Dhammeti tava desanādhamme. Dhammānuvattinoti taṃ dhammaṃ
tika-s0404t:754_3: sutvā tadanucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretvā maggaphalasacchikaraṇena dhammānuvattino.
tika-s0404t:754_4: Maccuno ṭhānabhūtanti kilesamārasaṅkhātassa maccuno nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Suduttaraṃ
tika-s0404t:754_5: taritvā pāramessantīti ye janā dhammānuvattino, te etaṃ suduttaraṃ duratikkamaṃ māradheyyaṃ
tika-s0404t:755_0: Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāyāti kāyaduccaritādibhedaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ jahitvā. Sukkaṃ
tika-s0404t:755_1: bhāvethāti paṇḍito bhikkhu abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā kāyasucaritādibhedaṃ
tika-s0404t:755_2: sukkaṃ dhammaṃ bhāveyya. Okā anokamāgammāti okaṃ vuccati ālayo, anokaṃ vuccati anālayo.
tika-s0404t:755_3: Ālayato nikkhamitvā anālayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭicca ārabbha.
tika-s0404t:756_0: Tatrābhiratimiccheyyāti yasmiṃ anālayasaṅkhāte viveke nibbāne imehi sattehi durabhiramaṃ,
tika-s0404t:756_1: tatrābhiratimiccheyya. Duvidhepi kāmeti vatthukāmakilesakāme. Cittaklesehīti pañcahi
tika-s0404t:756_2: nīvaraṇehi attānaṃ pariyodapeyya vodāpeyya, parisodheyyāti attho.
tika-s0404t:757_0: Sambodhiyaṅgesūti sambojjhaṅgesu. Sammā cittaṃ subhāvitanti sammā hetunā nayena cittaṃ
tika-s0404t:757_1: suṭṭhu bhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Jutimantoti ānubhāvavanto, arahattamaggañāṇajutiyā khandhādibhede
tika-s0404t:757_2: dhamme jotetvā ṭhitāti attho. Te loke parinibbutāti te imasmiṃ khandhādiloke parinibbutā
tika-s0404t:757_3: nāma arahattappattito paṭṭhāya kilesavaṭṭassa khepitattā saupādisesena, carimacittanirodhena
tika-s0404t:757_4: khandhavaṭṭassa khepitattā anupādisesena cāti dvīhi parinibbānehi parinibbutā, anupādāno
tika-s0404t:758: Ito paraṃ yāva tatiyo paṇṇāsako, tāva uttānatthameva.
tika-s0404t:764_0: 167-210. Dutiye ca paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Dasame pacchābhūmivāsinoti paccantadesavāsino.
tika-s0404t:764_1: Sevālamālikāti pātova udakaṃ orohitvā sevālañceva uppalādīni ca gahetvā attano udakasuddhikabhāvajānanatthañceva
tika-s0404t:764_2: “lokassa ca udakena suddhi hotī”ti imassa atthassa jānanatthañca mālaṃ katvā pilandhanakā.
tika-s0404t:764_3: Udakorohakāti pāto majjhanhe sāyanhe ca udakaorohaṇakā. Tenāha “sāyatatiyakaṃ udakorohaṇānuyogamanuyuttā”ti.
tika-s0404t:764_4: Ekādasamādīni uttānatthāni. Catutthe paṇṇāsake natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:769_0: 211-746. Pañcamassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Navame yasmiṃ santāne kāmāvacarakammaṃ
tika-s0404t:769_1: mahaggatakammañca katūpacitaṃ vipākadāne laddhāvasaraṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ, tesu kāmāvacarakammaṃ
tika-s0404t:769_2: itaraṃ nīharitvā sayaṃ tattha ṭhatvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti, mahaggatakammameva
tika-s0404t:769_3: pana itaraṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti garubhāvato. Tenāha “taṃ mahogho
tika-s0404t:769_4: parittaṃ udakaṃ viyā”tiādi. Ito paraṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
tika-s0404t:778_0: 1-10. Ekādasakanipātassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva. Dasame janitasminti kammakilesehi
tika-s0404t:778_1: nibbatte, jane etasminti vā janetasmiṃ, manussesūti attho. Tenāha “ye gottapaṭisārino”ti.
tika-s0404t:778_2: Janitasmiṃ-saddo eva vā i-kārassa e-kāraṃ katvā “janetasmi”nti vutto. Janitasminti
tika-s0404t:778_3: ca janasminti attho veditabbo. Janitasminti sāmaññaggahaṇepi yattha catuvaṇṇasamaññā,
tika-s0404t:778_4: tattheva manussaloke. Khattiyo seṭṭhoti ayaṃ lokasamaññāpi manussalokeyeva, na devakāye
tika-s0404t:778_5: brahmakāye vāti dassetuṃ “ye gottapaṭisārino”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭisarantīti “ahaṃ gotamo,
tika-s0404t:778_6: ahaṃ kassapo”ti paṭi paṭi attano gottaṃ anussaranti paṭijānanti vāti attho.
tika-s0404t:783_0: 11-14. Dutiyassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Tatiye kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānanti kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvīnaṃ.
tika-s0404t:783_1: Ko pana devānaṃ āhāro, kā āhāravelāti? Sabbesampi kāmāvacaradevānaṃ sudhā āhāro.
tika-s0404t:783_2: Sā heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamā hoti, taṃ yathāsakaṃ divasavaseneva
tika-s0404t:783_3: divase divase bhuñjanti. Keci pana “biḷārapadappamāṇaṃ sudhāhāraṃ bhuñjanti, so jivhāya
tika-s0404t:783_4: ṭhapitamatto yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati, tesaṃyeva divasavasena satta divase
tika-s0404t:783_5: yāpanasamattho hotī”ti vadanti. Asamayavimuttiyā vimuttoti maggavimokkhena vimutto.
tika-s0404t:783_6: Aṭṭhannañhi samāpattīnaṃ samāpajjanassa samayopi atthi tassa asamayopi, maggavimokkhena
tika-s0404t:783_7: pana vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthi. Yassa saddhā balavatī, vipassanā ca
tika-s0404t:783_8: āraddhā, tassa gacchantassa tiṭṭhantassa nisīdantassa nipajjantassa khādantassa bhuñjantassa
tika-s0404t:783_9: ca maggaphalappaṭivedho nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ. Iti maggavimokkhena vimuccantassa
tika-s0404t:783_10: samayo vā asamayo vā natthīti maggavimokkho asamayavimutti nāma. Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:786_0: 15. Pañcame sesajanāti mettāya cetovimuttiyā alābhino. Samparivattamānāti dakkhiṇeneva
tika-s0404t:786_1: passena asayitvā sabbaso parivattamānā. Kākacchamānāti ghurughurupassāsavasena vissaraṃ
tika-s0404t:786_2: karontā. Sukhaṃ supatīti ettha duvidhā supanā sayane piṭṭhippasāraṇalakkhaṇā kiriyāmayacittehi
tika-s0404t:786_3: avokiṇṇabhavaṅgappavattilakkhaṇā ca. Tatthāyaṃ ubhayatthāpi sukhameva supati. Yasmā
tika-s0404t:786_4: saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati, niddokkamanepi
tika-s0404t:786_5: jhānaṃ samāpanno viya hoti. Tenāha “evaṃ asupitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:787_0: Niddākāle sukhaṃ alabhitvā dukkhena suttattā eva paṭibujjhanakāle sarīrakhedena nitthunanaṃ
tika-s0404t:787_1: vijambhanaṃ ito cito ca viparivattanañca hotīti āha “nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā
tika-s0404t:787_2: dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhantī”ti. Ayaṃ pana sukhena suttattā sarīrakhedābhāvato nitthunanādivirahitova
tika-s0404t:787_3: paṭibujjhati. Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ appaṭibujjhitvā”tiādi. Sukhappaṭibodho ca sarīravikārābhāvenāti
tika-s0404t:788_0: Bhaddakameva supinaṃ passatīti idaṃ anubhūtapubbavasena devatūpasaṃhāravasena cassa
tika-s0404t:788_1: bhaddakameva supinaṃ hoti, na pāpakanti katvā vuttaṃ. Tenāha “cetiyaṃ vandanto viyā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:788_2: Dhātukkhobhahetukampi cassa bahulaṃ bhaddakameva siyā yebhuyyena cittajarūpānuguṇatāya utuāhārajarūpānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:789_0: Ure āmukkamuttāhāro viyāti gīvāya bandhitvā ure lambitamuttāhāro viyāti kehici taṃ
tika-s0404t:789_1: ekāvalivasena vuttaṃ siyā, anekaratanāvalisamūhabhūto pana muttāhāro aṃsappadesato
tika-s0404t:789_2: paṭṭhāya yāva kaṭippadesassa heṭṭhābhāgā palambanto ure āmukkoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-s0404t:790_0: Visākhatthero viyāti so kira pāṭaliputte kuṭumbiyo ahosi. So tattheva vasamāno assosi
tika-s0404t:790_2: sakkā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā, utusappāyaṃ senāsanasappāyaṃ puggalasappāyaṃ dhammassavanasappāyanti
tika-s0404t:790_3: sabbamettha sulabha”nti. So attano bhogakkhandhaṃ puttadārassa niyyātetvā dussante
tika-s0404t:790_4: baddhena ekakahāpaṇeneva gharā nikkhamitvā samuddatīre nāvaṃ udikkhamāno ekaṃ māsaṃ
tika-s0404t:790_5: vasi. So vohārakusalatāya imasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṇḍaṃ kiṇitvā asukasmiṃ vikkiṇanto dhammikāya
tika-s0404t:790_6: vaṇijjāya tenevantaramāsena sahassaṃ abhisaṃhari. Iti anupubbena mahāvihāraṃ gantvā
tika-s0404t:790_7: pabbajjaṃ yācati. So pabbājanatthāya sīmaṃ nīto taṃ sahassatthavikaṃ ovaṭṭikantarena
tika-s0404t:790_8: bhūmiyaṃ pātesi. “Kimeta”nti ca vutte “kahāpaṇasahassaṃ, bhante”ti vatvā, “upāsaka,
tika-s0404t:790_9: pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā vicāretuṃ, idāneva naṃ vicārehī”ti vutte “visākhassa
tika-s0404t:790_10: pabbajjaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā mā rittahatthā gamiṃsū”ti muñcitvā sīmāmāḷake vikkiritvā pabbajitvā
tika-s0404t:790_11: upasampanno. So pañcavasso hutvā dvemātikā paguṇā katvā attano sappāyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0404t:790_12: gahetvā ekekasmiṃ vihāre cattāro cattāro māse samapavattavāsaṃ vasamāno cari. Evaṃ caramāno –
tika-s0404t:794: Etthantare khalitaṃ natthi, aho lābho te mārisā”ti. ;
tika-s0404t:795_0: So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ patvā “ayaṃ nu kho maggo, udāhu aya”nti
tika-s0404t:795_1: cintayanto aṭṭhāsi. Athassa pabbate adhivatthā devatā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “eso maggo”ti
tika-s0404t:795_2: dasseti. So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gantvā tattha cattāro māse vasitvā “paccūse gamissāmī”ti
tika-s0404t:795_3: cintetvā nipajji. Caṅkamasīse maṇilarukkhe adhivatthā devatā sopānaphalake nisīditvā
tika-s0404t:795_4: parodi. Thero “ko eso”ti āha. Ahaṃ, bhante, maṇiliyāti. Kissa rodasīti? Tumhākaṃ
tika-s0404t:795_5: gamanaṃ paṭiccāti. Mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ ko guṇoti? Tumhesu, bhante, idha vasantesu
tika-s0404t:795_6: amanussā aññamaññaṃ mettaṃ paṭilabhanti, te dāni tumhesu gatesu kalahaṃ karissanti,
tika-s0404t:795_7: duṭṭhullampi kathayissantīti. Thero “sace mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ phāsuvihāro
tika-s0404t:795_8: hoti, sundara”nti vatvā aññepi cattāro māse tattheva vasitvā puna tatheva gamanacittaṃ
tika-s0404t:795_9: uppādesi. Devatāpi puna tatheva parodi. Eteneva upāyena thero tattheva vasitvā tattheva
tika-s0404t:795_10: parinibbāyīti. Evaṃ dhamattāvihārī bhikkhu amanussānaṃ piyo hoti.
tika-s0404t:796_0: Balavapiyacittatāyāti iminā balavapiyacittatāmattenapi satthaṃ na kamati, pageva
tika-s0404t:796_1: mettāya cetovimuttiyāti dasseti. Khippameva cittaṃ samādhiyati, kenaci paripanthena
tika-s0404t:796_3: khayāyā”ti keci. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Ettha ca kiñcāpi ito aññakammaṭṭhānavasena
tika-s0404t:798: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā”ti. ; Ca ādi –
tika-s0404t:799_0: Tathāpime ānisaṃsā brahmavihāralābhino anavasesā labbhanti byāpādādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato
tika-s0404t:799_1: brahmavihārānaṃ. Tenevāha “nissaraṇaṃ hetaṃ, āvuso, byāpādassa, yadidaṃ mettācetovimuttī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:799_2: Byāpādādivasena ca sattānaṃ dukkhasupanādayoti tappaṭipakkhabhūtesu brahmavihāresu
tika-s0404t:802_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe beluvagāmaketi vesāliyā dakkhiṇapasse avidūre beluvagāmako nāma atthi,
tika-s0404t:802_1: taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvāti attho. Sārappattakulagaṇanāyāti mahāsāramahappattakulagaṇanāya.
tika-s0404t:802_2: Dasame ṭhāneti aññe aññeti dasagaṇanaṭṭhāne. Aṭṭhakanagare jāto bhavoti aṭṭhakanāgaro.
tika-s0404t:803_1: vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato adhigato supākaṭo ca, taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0404t:803_2: saddhiṃ āgamanīyapaṭipadāya atthabhāveneva dassento “yo so…pe… abhisambuddho”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:803_3: Satipi ñāṇadassanasaddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ visayavisese
tika-s0404t:803_5: sabbaññutaññāṇamaṃsacakkhuvasena paṭivedhadesanāñāṇavasena ca tadatthaṃ yojetvā dassento
tika-s0404t:803_6: “tesaṃ tesa”ntiādimāha. Tattha āsayānusayaṃ jānatā āsayānusayañāṇena, sabbañeyyadhammaṃ
tika-s0404t:803_10: desanāpaññāya yāthāvato passatā. Arīnanti kilesārīnaṃ, pañcavidhamārānaṃ vā sāsanassa
tika-s0404t:803_11: vā paccatthikānaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ. Tesaṃ pana hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0404t:803_12: ajjhupekkhaṇañca. Kesivinayasuttañcettha nidassanaṃ. Tathā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni jānatā.
tika-s0404t:803_13: Yathākammūpage satte passatā. Savāsanānamāsavānaṃ khīṇattā arahatā. Abhiññeyyādibhede
tika-s0404t:804_0: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā. Kāyakammādivasena tiṇṇampi kammānaṃ
tika-s0404t:804_1: ñāṇānuparivattito nisammakāritāya passatā. Davādīnampi abhāvasādhikāya pahānasampadāya
tika-s0404t:804_2: arahatā. Chandādīnaṃ ahānihetubhūtāya akkhayapaṭibhānasādhikāya sabbaññutāya sammāsambuddhenāti
tika-s0404t:805_0: Abhisaṅkhatanti attano paccayehi abhisammukhabhāvena samecca sambhuyya kataṃ. Svāssa
tika-s0404t:805_1: katabhāvo uppādanena veditabbo, na uppannassa paṭisaṅkharaṇenāti āha “uppādita”nti.
tika-s0404t:805_2: Te cassa paccayā cetanāpadhānāti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayita”nti
tika-s0404t:805_3: vuttanti “cetayitaṃ kappayita”nti atthamāha. Abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitanti ca
tika-s0404t:805_4: jhānassa pātubhāvadassanamukhena viddhaṃsanabhāvaṃ ulliṅgeti. Yañhi ahutvā sambhavati,
tika-s0404t:805_5: taṃ hutvā paṭiveti. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ “yaṃ kho panā”tiādi. Samathavipassanādhamme ṭhitoti
tika-s0404t:805_6: ettha samathadhamme ṭhitattā samāhito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aniccānupassanādīhi
tika-s0404t:805_7: niccasaññādayo pajahanto anukkamena taṃ anulomañāṇaṃ pāpetā hutvā vipassannādhamme
tika-s0404t:805_8: ṭhito. Samathavipassanāsaṅkhātesu dhammesu rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo. Nandanaṭṭhena nandī.
tika-s0404t:805_9: Tattha sukhumā apekkhā vuttā. Yā nikantīti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:806_0: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ yathārutavaseneva imassa suttapadassa atthe gahetabbe sati. Samathavipassanāsu
tika-s0404t:806_1: chandarāgo kattabboti anāgāmiphalaṃ anibbattetvā tadatthāya samathavipassanāpi anibbattetvā
tika-s0404t:806_2: kevalaṃ tattha chandarāgo kattabbo bhavissati. Kasmā? Tesu samathavipassanāsaṅkhātesu
tika-s0404t:806_3: dhammesu chandarāgamattena anāgāminā laddhabbassa aladdhaanāgāmiphalenapi laddhabbattā.
tika-s0404t:806_4: Tathā sati tena anāgāmiphalampi laddhabbameva hoti. Tenāha “anāgāmiphalaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ
tika-s0404t:806_5: bhavissatī”ti. Sabhāvato rasitabbattā aviparīto attho eva attharaso.
tika-s0404t:807: Aññāpi kāci sugatiyoti vinipātike sandhāyāha. Aññāpi kāci duggatiyoti asurakāyamāha.
tika-s0404t:808_0: Appaṃ yācitena bahuṃ dentena uḷārapurisena viya ekaṃ dhammaṃ pucchitena “ayampi ekadhammo”ti
tika-s0404t:808_1: kathitattā ekādasapi dhammā pucchāvasena ekadhammo nāma jāto paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanañāyena.
tika-s0404t:808_2: Pucchāvasenāti “atthi nu kho, bhante ānanda, tena…pe… sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo
tika-s0404t:808_3: sammadakkhāto”ti evaṃ pavattapucchāvasena. Amatuppattiatthenāti amatabhāvassa uppattihetutāya,
tika-s0404t:808_4: sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni ekarasāpi amatādhigamassa paṭipattiyāti attho. Evamettha
tika-s0404t:808_5: aggaphalabhūmi anāgāmiphalabhūmīti dveva bhūmiyo sarūpato āgatā, nānantariyatāya
tika-s0404t:808_6: pana heṭṭhimāpi dve bhūmiyo atthato āgatā evāti daṭṭhabbāti. Pañca satāni aggho etassāti
tika-s0404t:811_0: 17. Sattame tisso kathāti tisso aṭṭhakathā, tividhā suttassa atthavaṇṇanāti attho.
tika-s0404t:811_1: Ekekaṃ padaṃ nāḷaṃ mūlaṃ etissāti evaṃsaññitā ekanāḷikā. Ekekaṃ vā padaṃ nāḷaṃ atthaniggamanamaggo
tika-s0404t:811_2: etissāti ekanāḷikā. Tenāha “ekekassa padassa atthakathana”nti. Cattāro aṃsā bhāgā
tika-s0404t:811_3: atthasallakkhaṇūpāyā etissāti caturassā. Tenāha “catukkaṃ bandhitvā kathana”nti.
tika-s0404t:811_4: Niyamato nisinnassa āraddhassa vatto saṃvatto etissā atthīti nisinnavattikā, yathāraddhassa
tika-s0404t:811_5: atthassa visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpikāti attho. Tenāha “paṇḍitagopālakaṃ dassetvā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:811_6: Ekekassapi padassa piṇḍatthadassanavasena bahūnaṃ padānaṃ ekajjhaṃ atthaṃ akathetvā
tika-s0404t:811_7: ekamekassa padassa atthavaṇṇanā ayaṃ sabbattha labbhati. Catukkaṃ bandhitvāti kaṇhapakkhe
tika-s0404t:811_8: upamopameyyadvayaṃ, tathā sukkapakkheti idaṃ catukkaṃ yojetvā. Ayaṃ edisesu eva suttesu
tika-s0404t:811_9: labbhati. Pariyosānagamananti keci tāva āhu “kaṇhapakkhe upamaṃ dassetvā upamā ca
tika-s0404t:811_10: nāma yāvadeva upameyyasampaṭipādanatthāti upameyyatthaṃ āharitvā saṃkilesapakkhaniddeso
tika-s0404t:811_11: ca vodānapakkhavibhāvanatthāyāti sukkapakkhampi upamopameyyavibhāgena āharitvā suttatthassa
tika-s0404t:811_12: pariyosāpanaṃ. Kaṇhapakkhe upameyyaṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamanādīsupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0404t:811_13: Apare pana “kaṇhapakkhe, sukkapakkhe ca taṃtaṃupamūpameyyatthānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpetvāva
tika-s0404t:811_14: kathanaṃ pariyosānagamana”nti vadanti. Ayanti nisinnavattikā. Idhāti imasmiṃ gopālakasutte.
tika-s0404t:811_15: Sabbācariyānaṃ āciṇṇāti sabbehipi pubbācariyehi ācaritā saṃvaṇṇitā, tathā ceva pāḷi pavattāti.
tika-s0404t:812_0: Aṅgīyanti avayavabhāvena ñāyantīti aṅgāni, koṭṭhāsā. Tāni panettha yasmā sāvajjasabhāvāni,
tika-s0404t:812_1: tasmā āha “aṅgehīti aguṇakoṭṭhāsehī”ti. Gomaṇḍalanti gosamūhaṃ. Pariharitunti rakkhituṃ.
tika-s0404t:812_2: Taṃ pana pariharaṇaṃ pariggahetvā vicaraṇanti āha “pariggahetvā vicaritu”nti. Vaḍḍhinti
tika-s0404t:812_3: gunnaṃ bahubhāvaṃ bahugorasatāsaṅkhātaṃ parivuddhiṃ. “Ettakamida”nti rūpīyatīti rūpaṃ,
tika-s0404t:812_4: parimāṇaparicchedopi sarīrarūpampīti āha “gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā”ti. Na pariyesati
tika-s0404t:812_5: vinaṭṭhabhāvasseva ajānanato. Nīlāti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho. Tena setasabalādivaṇṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t:813_0: Dhanusattisūlādīti ettha issāsācariyānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ dhanulakkhaṇaṃ. Kumārabhattigaṇānaṃ
tika-s0404t:813_1: gāvīsu kataṃ sattilakkhaṇaṃ. Issarabhattigaṇānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ sūlalakkhaṇanti yojanā.
tika-s0404t:813_2: Ādi-saddena rāmavāsudevagaṇādīnaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ pharasucakkādilakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t:814: Nīlamakkhikāti piṅgalamakkhikā, khuddakamakkhikā eva vā. Saṭati rujati etāyāti sāṭikā, saṃvaḍḍhā sāṭikā āsāṭikā. Tenāha “vaḍḍhantī”tiādi. Hāretāti apanetā.
tika-s0404t:815_0: Vākenāti vākapaṭṭena. Cīrakenāti pilotikena. Antovasseti vassakālassa abbhantare.
tika-s0404t:815_1: Niggāhanti susumārādiggāharahitaṃ. Pītanti pānīyassa pītabhāvaṃ. Sīhabyagghādiparissayena
tika-s0404t:816: Pañca ahāni ekassāti pañcāhiko, so eva vāroti, pañcāhikavāro. Evaṃ sattāhikavāropi veditabbo. Ciṇṇaṭṭhānanti caritaṭṭhānaṃ gocaraggahitaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:817_0: Pitiṭṭhānanti pitarā kātabbaṭṭhānaṃ, pitarā kātabbakiccanti attho. Yathāruciṃ gahetvā
tika-s0404t:817_1: gacchantīti gunnaṃ rucianurūpaṃ gocarabhūmiṃ vā nadipāraṃ vā gahetvā gacchanti. Gobhattanti
tika-s0404t:817_2: kappāsaṭṭhikādimissaṃ gobhuñjitabbaṃ bhattaṃ. Bhattaggahaṇeneva yāgupi saṅgahitā.
tika-s0404t:818_0: Dvīhākārehīti vuttaṃ ākāradvayaṃ dassetuṃ “gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:818_1: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatāti “upacayo santatī”ti jātiṃ dvidhā bhinditvā hadayavatthuṃ aggahetvā
tika-s0404t:818_2: dasāyatanāni pañcadasa sukhumarūpānīti evaṃ rūpakaṇḍapāḷiyaṃ āgatā. Pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsāti
tika-s0404t:818_3: salakkhaṇato aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvato rūpabhāgā. Rūpakoṭṭhāsāti vā visuṃ visuṃ appavattitvā
tika-s0404t:818_4: kalāpabhāveneva pavattanato rūpakalāpā. Koṭṭhāsāti ca aṃsā avayavāti attho. Koṭṭhanti
tika-s0404t:818_5: vā sarīraṃ, tassa aṃsā kesādayo koṭṭhāsāti aññepi avayavā koṭṭhāsā viya koṭṭhāsā.
tika-s0404t:819_0: Seyyathāpītiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Tattha rūpaṃ pariggahetvāti yathāvuttaṃ rūpaṃ salakkhaṇato
tika-s0404t:819_1: ñāṇena pariggaṇhitvā. Arūpaṃ vavatthapetvāti taṃ rūpaṃ nissāya ārammaṇañca katvā
tika-s0404t:819_2: pavattamāne vedanādike cattāro khandhe arūpanti vavatthapetvā. Rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvāti
tika-s0404t:819_3: puna tattha yaṃ rūppanalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ rūpaṃ. Tadaññaṃ arūpaṃ. Ubhayavinimuttaṃ kiñci
tika-s0404t:819_4: natthi attā vā attaniyaṃ vāti evaṃ rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā. Tadubhayañca avijjādinā
tika-s0404t:819_5: paccayena sapaccayanti paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā, aniccatādilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā yo kalāpasammasanādikkamena
tika-s0404t:819_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti, so na vaḍḍhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0404t:820_0: Ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānanti cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:820_1: kāyāyatanaṃ, itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyanti aṭṭhavidhaṃ kammavasena;
tika-s0404t:820_2: kāyaviññatti, vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ cittavasenāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:820_3: Saddāyatanamekaṃ utucittavasena dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ. Rūpassa lahutā, mudutā, kammaññatāti
tika-s0404t:820_4: ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhāravasena tisamuṭṭhānaṃ. Rūpāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:820_5: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, ākāsadhātu, āpodhātu, kabaḷīkāro āhāroti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhārakammavasena
tika-s0404t:820_6: catusamuṭṭhānaṃ. Upacayo, santati, jaratā, rūpassa aniccatāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ na kutoci
tika-s0404t:820_7: samuṭṭhātīti na jānāti. Samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānantotiādīsu vattabbaṃ “gaṇanato rūpaṃ
tika-s0404t:821_0: Kammalakkhaṇoti attanā kataṃ duccaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, bālo.
tika-s0404t:821_1: Vuttañhetaṃ – “tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Duccintitacintī
tika-s0404t:821_2: hoti, dubbhāsitabhāsī, dukkaṭakammakārī. Imāni kho…pe… lakkhaṇānī”ti. Attanā kataṃ
tika-s0404t:821_3: sucaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, paṇḍito. Vuttampi cetaṃ “tīṇimāni,
tika-s0404t:821_4: bhikkhave, paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Sucintitacintī hoti, subhāsitabhāsī,
tika-s0404t:821_5: sukatakammakārī. Imāni kho…pe… paṇḍitalakkhaṇānī”ti. Tenāha “kusalākusalakammaṃ paṇḍitabālalakkhaṇa”nti.
tika-s0404t:822_0: Bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevatīti yaṃ bālapuggale vajjetvā paṇḍitasevanaṃ atthakāmena
tika-s0404t:822_1: kātabbaṃ, taṃ na karoti. Tathābhūtassa ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ puna “bāle vajjetvā”tiādi
tika-s0404t:822_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ bhagavatā “idaṃ vo kappatī”ti anuññātaṃ, tadanulomañce, taṃ kappiyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:822_3: Yaṃ “idaṃ vo na kappatī”ti paṭikkhittaṃ, tadanulomañce, taṃ akappiyaṃ. Yaṃ kosallasambhūtaṃ,
tika-s0404t:822_4: taṃ kusalaṃ, tappaṭipakkhaṃ akusalaṃ. Tadeva sāvajjaṃ, kusalaṃ anavajjaṃ. Āpattito
tika-s0404t:822_5: ādito dve āpattikkhandhā garukaṃ, tadaññaṃ lahukaṃ. Dhammato mahāsāvajjaṃ garukaṃ,
tika-s0404t:822_6: appasāvajjaṃ lahukaṃ. Sappaṭikāraṃ satekicchaṃ, appaṭikāraṃ atekicchaṃ. Dhammatānugataṃ
tika-s0404t:822_7: kāraṇaṃ, itaraṃ akāraṇaṃ. Taṃ ajānantoti kappiyākappiyaṃ, garuka-lahukaṃ, satekicchātekicchaṃ
tika-s0404t:822_8: ajānanto suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti. Kusalākusalaṃ, sāvajjānavajjaṃ,
tika-s0404t:822_9: kāraṇākāraṇaṃ ajānanto khandhādīsu akusalatāya rūpārūpapariggahampi kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0404t:822_10: kuto tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhanā. Tenāha “kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0404t:823: Govaṇasadise attabhāve uppajjitvā tattha dukkhuppattihetuto micchāvitakkā āsāṭikā viyāti āsāṭikāti āha “akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā”ti.
tika-s0404t:824_0: “Gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato chahi
tika-s0404t:824_1: vaṇamukhehi vissandamānayūso gaṇḍo viya pilotikākhaṇḍena chadvārehi vissandamānakilesāsuci
tika-s0404t:824_2: attabhāvavaṇo satisaṃvarena pidahitabbo, ayaṃ pana evaṃ na karotīti āha “yathā so
tika-s0404t:824_3: gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti, evaṃ saṃvaraṃ na sampādetī”ti.
tika-s0404t:825_0: Yathā dhūmo indhanaṃ nissāya uppajjamāno saṇho sukhumo, taṃ taṃ vivaraṃ anupavissa
tika-s0404t:825_1: byāpento sattānaṃ ḍaṃsamakasādiparissayaṃ vinodeti, aggijālāsamuṭṭhānassa pubbaṅgamo
tika-s0404t:825_2: hoti, evaṃ dhammadesanāñāṇassa indhanabhūtaṃ rūpārūpadhammajātaṃ nissāya uppajjamānā
tika-s0404t:825_3: saṇhā sukhumā taṃ taṃ khandhantaraṃ āyatanantarañca anupavissa byāpeti, sattānaṃ
tika-s0404t:825_4: micchāvitakkādiparissayaṃ vinodeti, ñāṇaggijālāsamuṭṭhāpanassa pubbaṅgamo hoti, tasmā
tika-s0404t:825_5: dhūmo viyāti dhūmoti āha “gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karotī”ti. Attano
tika-s0404t:825_6: santikaṃ upagantvā nisinnassa kātabbā tadanucchavikā dhammakathā upanisinnakakathā.
tika-s0404t:825_7: Katassa dānādipuññassa anumodanakathā anumodanā. Tatoti dhammakathādīnaṃ akaraṇato.
tika-s0404t:825_8: “Bahussuto guṇavāti na jānantī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu attano jānāpanatthaṃ dhammakathādi
tika-s0404t:825_9: na kātabbamevāti? Saccaṃ na kātabbameva, suddhāsayena pana dhamme kathite tassa guṇajānanaṃ
tika-s0404t:827: Bhāsaye jotaye dhammaṃ, paggaṇhe isinaṃ dhaja”nti.
tika-s0404t:828_0: Taranti otaranti etthāti titthaṃ, naditaḷākādīnaṃ nahānapānādiatthaṃ otaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:828_1: Yathā pana taṃ udakena otiṇṇasattānaṃ sarīramalaṃ pavāheti, parissamaṃ vinodeti,
tika-s0404t:828_2: visuddhiṃ uppādeti, evaṃ bahussutā attano samīpaṃ otiṇṇasattānaṃ dhammodakena cittamalaṃ
tika-s0404t:828_3: pavāhenti, parissamaṃ vinodenti, visuddhiṃ uppādenti, tasmā te titthaṃ viyāti titthaṃ.
tika-s0404t:828_4: Tenāha “titthabhūte bahussutabhikkhū”ti. Byañjanaṃ kathaṃ ropetabbanti, bhante, idaṃ
tika-s0404t:828_5: byañjanaṃ ayaṃ saddo kathaṃ imasmiṃ atthe ropetabbo, kena pakārena imassa atthassa
tika-s0404t:828_6: vācako jāto. “Nirūpetabba”nti vā pāṭho, nirūpetabbaṃ ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti kathamettha
tika-s0404t:828_7: nirūḷhāti adhippāyo. Imassa bhāsitassa ko atthoti saddatthaṃ pucchati. Imasmiṃ ṭhāneti
tika-s0404t:828_8: imasmiṃ pāḷippadese. Pāḷi kiṃ vadatīti bhāvatthaṃ pucchati. Attho kiṃ dīpetīti bhāvatthaṃ
tika-s0404t:828_9: vā? Saṅketatthaṃ vā. Na paripucchatīti vimaticchedanapucchāvasena sabbaso pucchaṃ
tika-s0404t:828_10: na karoti. Na paripañhatīti pari pari attano ñātuṃ icchaṃ na ācikkhati, na vibhāveti.
tika-s0404t:828_11: Tenāha “na jānāpetī”ti. Teti bahussutabhikkhū. Vivaraṇaṃ nāma atthassa vibhajitvā
tika-s0404t:828_12: kathananti āha “bhājetvā na desentī”ti. Anuttānīkatanti ñāṇena apākaṭīkataṃ guyhaṃ
tika-s0404t:828_13: paṭicchannaṃ. Na uttāniṃ karontīti sinerupādamūle vālikaṃ uddharanto viya pathavīsandhārodakaṃ
tika-s0404t:828_14: vivaritvā dassento viya ca uttānaṃ na karonti.
tika-s0404t:829_0: Evaṃ yassa dhammassa vasena bahussutā “tittha”nti vuttā pariyāyato. Idāni tameva
tika-s0404t:829_1: dhammaṃ nippariyāyato “tittha”nti dassetuṃ “yathā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dhammo hi taranti
tika-s0404t:829_2: otaranti etena nibbānaṃ nāma taḷākanti “tittha”nti vuccati. Tenāha bhagavā sumedhabhūto –
tika-s0404t:831: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe”ti. –
tika-s0404t:832: Dhammasseva nibbānassotaraṇatitthabhūtassa otaraṇākāraṃ ajānanto “dhammatitthaṃ na jānātī”ti vutto.
tika-s0404t:833_0: Pītāpītanti gogaṇe pītaṃ apītañca gorūpaṃ na jānāti, na vindati. Avindanto hi “na
tika-s0404t:833_1: labhatī”ti vutto. “Ānisaṃsaṃ na vindatī”ti vatvā tassa avindanākāraṃ dassento “dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:834_0: Ayaṃ lokuttaroti padaṃ sandhāyāha “ariya”nti. Paccāsattiñāyena anantarassa hi vippaṭisedho
tika-s0404t:834_1: vā. Ariyasaddo vā niddosapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo. Aṭṭhaṅgikanti ca visuṃ ekajjhañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
tika-s0404t:834_2: upādāya gahetabbaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgatā bāhullato ca. Evañca katvā sattaṅgassapi ariyamaggassa
tika-s0404t:835_0: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānetiādīsu avisesena satipaṭṭhānā vuttā. Tattha kāyavedanācittadhammārammaṇā
tika-s0404t:835_1: satipaṭṭhānā lokiyā, tattha sammohaviddhaṃsanavasena pavattā nibbānārammaṇā lokuttarāti
tika-s0404t:835_2: evaṃ “ime lokiyā, ime lokuttarā”ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
tika-s0404t:836_0: Anavasesaṃ duhatīti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto kismiñci dāyake saddhāhāniyā, kismiñci
tika-s0404t:836_1: paccayahāniyā anavasesaṃ duhati. Vācāya abhihāro vācābhihāro. Paccayānaṃ abhihāro paccayābhihāro.
tika-s0404t:837_0: “Ime amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī”ti iminā navakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā
tika-s0404t:837_1: abhāvaṃ dasseti ācariyupajjhāyesu pitupemassa anupaṭṭhāpanato, tena ca sikkhāgāravatābhāvadīpanena
tika-s0404t:837_2: saṅgahassa abhājanabhāvaṃ, tena therānaṃ tesu anuggahābhāvaṃ. Na hi sīlādiguṇehi
tika-s0404t:837_3: sāsane thirabhāvappattā ananuggahetabbe sabrahmacārī anuggaṇhanti, niratthakaṃ vā
tika-s0404t:837_4: anuggahaṃ karonti. Tenāha “navake bhikkhū”tiādi. Dhammakathābandhanti paveṇiāgataṃ
tika-s0404t:837_6: guḷhaganthaṃ. Vuttavipallāsavasenāti “na rūpaññū”tiādīsu vuttassa paṭisedhassa paṭikkhepavasena
tika-s0404t:837_7: aggahaṇavasena. Yojetvāti “rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ jānātī”tiādinā,
tika-s0404t:837_8: “tassa gogaṇopi na parihāyati, pañcagorasaparibhogatopi na paribāhiro hotī”tiādinā
tika-s0404t:837_9: ca atthaṃ yojetvā. Veditabboti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pade yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo. Sesaṃ
tika-s0404t:844_0: Mahāaṭṭhakathāya sāranti aṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya sāraṃ. Ekūnasaṭṭhimattoti thokaṃ
tika-s0404t:844_2: sārameva anunigamavasena vadati. Atha vā mūlaṭṭhakathāsāranti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṃ.
tika-s0404t:844_3: Tenedaṃ dasseti – aṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ manorathapūraṇiṃ
tika-s0404t:844_4: karonto sesamahānikāyānampi mūlaṭṭhakathāsu idha viniyogakkhamaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāya
tika-s0404t:844_5: evamakāsinti. Mahāvihārādhivāsīnanti ca idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ
tika-s0404t:844_7: ādāyā”ti. Tenāti puññena. Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko
tika-s0404t:844_8: yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamavasena sampattena nibbānasukhena sukhī sukhito hotūti
tika-s0404t:844_9: sadevakassa lokassa accantaṃ sukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
tika-s0404t:855: Yaṃ siddhaṃ iminā puññaṃ, yaṃ caññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā;
tika-s0404t:863: Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva imaṃ pajaṃ;
tika-s0404t:865: Ime ca pāṇino sabbe, sabbadā nirupaddavā;
